query_title_en: There's a hole on the sole of my foot.
query_title_zh: 【求助】脚心上有个洞
query_content_en: It was previously scratched open and healed, but it started hurting again, so I scratched it off, leaving a small hole. I'm really scared and it hurts a lot. Any suggestions on how to heal this? It's caused by the friction from walking.
query_content_zh: 是以前抠破的，又长起来了，但是扎的脚疼，就又抠下来了，就成了个小洞，好害怕啊，有什么方法能好起来，真的好疼。是走路磨的

responses.content_en: This is a corn or callus. You can try over the counter products such as salicylic acid, soaking in warm water and using a pumice stone as well as the duct tape method. Replace your shoes if worn out. See a Podiatry specialist for further treatment if no improvement with the above recommendations.
responses.content_zh: 这是鸡眼或老茧。您可以尝试使用含水杨酸的非处方产品，泡温水并使用浮石去角质，或者采用胶带法。如果鞋子已经磨损，建议更换。如果按照这些建议没有改善，建议去看足病专科医生进行进一步治疗。

responses.content_en: Difficult to visualize however given description, possibly a plantar wart.  Over-the-counter treatment for plantar wart may be successful however if it is exceedingly bothersome, may require podiatry evaluation for possible excision.
responses.content_zh: 难以清楚观察，但根据描述，可能是足底疣。非处方治疗可能有效，但如果症状严重，可能需要足病科评估并考虑切除。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say based on the image provided, I would recommend covering the area with a dressing to reduce friction from walking. Based on this image, it does not appear to be infected however it is hard to say whether there is an underlying foreign body and this is a prior puncture wound. I would recommend being seen by a provider in person to evaluate further.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难说，我建议用包扎敷料覆盖该区域，以减少行走时的摩擦。 根据这张图片，这是之前已造成的穿刺伤口、它似乎没有感染，但很难说表面下有否异物。我建议由医护人员亲自作进一步评估。

query_title_en: Asking for advice!
query_title_zh: 求助
query_content_en: My finger got smashed in the door and now it looks like this. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 手指被门夹了成这样了怎么办

responses.content_en: Perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. A tetanus vaccine is also recommended if you have not received it in the past 5 years.  If you are concerned about an infection or have other symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding, consult a doctor and have this evaluated in-person.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，建议接种。如果您担心感染或出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血等症状，请咨询医生并进行面对面的检查。

responses.content_en: Unable to visualize based on picture quality.  Cannot provide any information at this time.
responses.content_zh: 由于图片品质不良，无法清楚查看伤口，目前无法提供相关信息。

responses.content_en: Based on the image, it is difficult to say whether there is underlying nailbed damage. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether you have a underlying fracture and further management of this trauma to your finger.
responses.content_zh: 根据图像，很难说下层的指甲床有否受损。我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定是否下面有骨折，并进一步治疗手指的创伤。

query_title_en: It's been two days since the stitches were removed, and I still can't make a tight fist.
query_title_zh: 缝完针拆线两天，手还是不敢握紧拳头
query_content_en: Will the wound split open if I make a fist?
query_content_zh: 用力握拳伤口会裂开吗

responses.content_en: The tightness is likely due to scar tissue. There is a possibility that the wound may open if there is too much pressure applied to the site. You can perform gentle range of motion exercises and the scar tissue will likely gradually soften over time.
responses.content_zh: 紧绷感可能是由疤痕组织引起的。如果对该部位施加过大压力，伤口可能会裂开。您可以进行轻柔的关节活动练习，疤痕组织可能会随着时间的推移逐渐软化。

responses.content_en: There appears to be some scabbing and scarring present.  Wound will need more time for healing.  You should do range of motion exercises to prevent contracture of the skin.  Given that it is on an extensor surface and sutures were recently removed, there is some possibility of wound dehiscence.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine.  You may apply topical moisturizers or topical antibiotic ointment to keep the skin moist which will increase pliability of the skin.
responses.content_zh: 伤口上有一些结痂和疤痕，仍需更多时间愈合。你应做关节活动练习以防止皮肤挛缩。由于伤口位于伸肌表面，且缝线刚被拆除，有可能造成伤口裂开。避免使用干燥物质，如酒精、过氧化氢或碘。你可以涂抹保湿剂或抗生素软膏，保持皮肤湿润，提升皮肤的柔韧。

responses.content_en: I would start by making small hand movements rather than immediately moving to a fist, start by flexing and extending your palm and as your mobility starts to increase with time with your hand then I would move toward making a fist. It is important that you do exercises to promote wound healing in this area or it may completely scar over and reduce your long-term mobility.
responses.content_zh: 我会从轻微的手部活动开始；开始时从弯曲和伸展手掌，而不是立即握拳。随着时间的进展，手的活动能力开始增强，然后我会进而握拳。重要的是，你要做运动来促进这个部位的伤口愈合，否则它可能会完全结疤、那会降低你的长期活动能力。

query_title_en: Is there a physician here?
query_title_zh: 有大夫在吗
query_content_en: How many days will it take for this kind of wound to heal?
query_content_zh: 像这种伤口几天会好

responses.content_en: It depends on how the injury occurred. But based on your photo, it may take weeks-months.
responses.content_zh: 这取决于受伤的方式，但根据您的照片，可能需要几周到几个月的时间。

responses.content_en: Difficult to visualize the wound, unclear as to the inciting event or etiology of the wound.  Unclear as to the location on the body.  Appears to be on a flexor surface, likely a pressure injury.  Would recommend applying bacitracin/Xeroform with antibiotic ointment and covering with a dry dressing, changing daily.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, 100 peroxide, or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口不易观察，无法确定伤口的原因或部位。似乎位于屈侧表面，可能是压疮。建议使用百多邦/Xeroform和抗生素软膏覆盖干敷料，每日更换。避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。

responses.content_en: This type of wound may take weeks to completely heal and it is possible that it may scar.  I would recommend avoiding sunlight and applying SPF as needed.
responses.content_zh: 这种类型的伤口可能需要数周才能完全愈合，并且可能会留下疤痕。我建议避免阳光照射，并根据需要涂抹防晒霜。

query_title_en: Seeking help.
query_title_zh: 求助
query_content_en: Cleaned it up, but how to treat it? It's suppurating
query_content_zh: 清理干净了，怎么治疗？化脓了

responses.content_en: There is redness around the wound.  I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as this may be a sign of an infection. You may also need to see a Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss reconstructive procedures such as a skin graft or flap to assist with the healing process.
responses.content_zh: 伤口周围有发红的现象。我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心接受进一步评估，因为这可能是感染的迹象。您可能还需要看整形外科专家，讨论皮肤移植或皮瓣等重建手术，以加速愈合过程。

responses.content_en: Unclear mechanism but appears to have signs of secondary infection with surrounding erythema.  Likely needs topical and oral antibiotics as well as thoroguh wound care.
responses.content_zh: 机制不明，但出现了继发感染的迹象，伴有周围红斑。可能需要局部和口服抗生素，并进行彻底的伤口护理。

responses.content_en: There is some granulation tissue over the wound which suggests that the wound is attempting to heal. However, the wound appears to have surrounding erythema (redness) which is concerning for an underlying infection. Given the location, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to evaluate the area and see if further drainage is warranted, the depth of the infection, and/or if antibiotics are warranted.
responses.content_zh: 伤口上有一些肉芽组织，显示伤口正在试图愈合中。然而，伤口周围似乎有红斑（发红），伤口可能已受到感染。鉴於受伤位置，我建议你亲自去看医生，评估受伤部位，看看是否需要进一步引流、评估感染深度、和/或是否需要使用抗生素。

query_title_en: Slipped last night, toe got cracked and bled a lot. Does it need stitches?
query_title_zh: 昨晚滑倒，脚趾撞裂了 流了蛮多血，这状态需要缝针吗？
query_content_en: How should this wound be treated? — From Nokia Windows Phone
query_content_zh: 伤口还需要怎么处理啊？ ——来自 诺基亚 Windows Phone

responses.content_en: If it continues to bleed, you may need to go to the nearest Urgent Care for stitches. Otherwise, perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with gauze and a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 如果出血持续，您可能需要前往最近的急诊护理中心进行缝合。或是继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用纱布和绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Difficult to appreciate tissue injury from picture.  If tissue does not gap significantly or if wound is not very deep could likely avoid stitches and do buddy taping with adjacent toe with topical antibiotic ointment.
responses.content_zh: 从图片中难以判断组织损伤情况。如果组织没有明显裂开或伤口不深，可能可以避免缝合，使用邻近脚趾的指带固定法，并涂抹抗生素软膏。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen in person by a physician to determine the depth of the injury as it is difficult to say based on this one picture. You will likely need some sutures to encourage the skin to stay together if it is more than just superficial. If you have not received a tetanus shot in the last 10 years you would need a tdap vaccine as well.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定受伤的深度。因为根据这张照片很难确定。如果受损的皮肤不仅仅是表面的，你可能需要缝线来助长皮肤连在一起。如果你在过去10年里没有接种破伤风疫苗，你也需要接种TDAP(破伤风、白喉和无细胞性百日咳)疫苗。

query_title_en: Wound
query_title_zh: 伤口
query_content_en: Can someone take a look at my leg wound? I don't know how it happen. Perhaps it was bitten by something?
query_content_zh: 大家帮我看看腿上的伤痕，不知道怎么弄的～不会被咬的吧

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say what caused this wound without taking a closer look in-person. Perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 在不亲自检查的情况下，很难判断是什么导致了这个伤口。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓液分泌等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be fairly shallow ulcer with no surrounding signs of infection.  Would recommend local wound care with gentle cleaning 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water.  Would additionally recommend topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来是较浅的溃疡，没有感染的迹象。建议局部伤口护理，每天1至3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗。同时建议使用局部抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料。避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say what causes based on the type of wound and location. It could potentially be a bite versus a friction injury.
responses.content_zh: 根据伤口的类型和位置，很难说是什么原因造成的。这可能是咬伤、或是摩擦伤。

query_title_en: Please help, it's urgent!
query_title_zh: 求大神，急急！
query_content_en: On the 27th, around 11 a.m., my finger was crushed by a machine, and there was a lot of blood. I went to the hospital for an X-ray and waited for the results. At around 2 p.m., I got a tetanus shot, and the doctor did surgery to stitch the wound, which bleed a lot. The wound is deep, and they did six stitches. At around 6 p.m., I started to have whole body cold sweat, difficulty breathing at the subway. My injured hand became numb and cramped. It lasted about 3 minutes before getting better. Could this be tetanus?
query_content_zh: 27号上午11点左右，手指被机器压破，流很多血，去医院拍片，等结果，下午2点左右打得破伤风，然后医生手术逢针流很多血，伤口深逢6针。下午6点左右在地铁全身出冷汗，呼吸困难，手术那只手麻痹，抽筋，3分钟左右好转，请问会是破伤风吗。

responses.content_en: The symptoms you described are not consistent with tetanus. Symptoms of tetanus include fever, chills, stiff muscles including locking of the jaw, increased heart rate and tachycardia.
responses.content_zh: 你描述的症状与破伤风不符。破伤风的症状包括发烧、寒战、肌肉僵硬（包括下颌紧锁）、心跳加快和心动过速。

responses.content_en: Picture quality is very poor and it is difficult to fully appreciate the injury.  Description of the injury includes a crush injury with sutures.  Unclear if there was an underlying fracture and difficult to tell if this picture is before or after receiving sutures.  In regards to the clinical question, given the temporal nature of the injury, the fact that the your tetanus shot got updated, overall very low suspicion for acute tetanus infection as your symptoms did improve.
responses.content_zh: 图片质量较差，难以清晰观察伤情。描述中提到有挤压伤并已缝合，但不清楚是否存在骨折，也不确定图片是拍摄于缝合前还是缝合后。针对临床问题，由于伤情时间较短且破伤风疫苗已更新，急性破伤风感染的可能性较低，因为症状已有改善。

responses.content_en: Unclear as to what caused the whole body sensation and shortness of breath, it is possible that this was a vasovagal reaction however I would recommend being seen by a physician in person for further workup if the symptoms persist. There is low likelihood however that this is due to tetanus as this would not act this quickly.
responses.content_zh: 不清楚为何全身受到影响和呼吸急促。这可能是血管迷走神经反应。如果症状持续，我建议亲自去看医生来造进一步检查。然而，这是由于破伤风引起的可能性很小，因为这种情况不会如此迅速地发生。

query_title_en: Need help.
query_title_zh: 求帮助
query_content_en: Three days ago, I scraped my ankle on a stone while helping someone move things. It bled a bit and I ignored it. Should I get a tetanus shot? Any advice?
query_content_zh: 三天前 帮人搬东西 脚踝不小心蹭到石头 蹭破皮 流了点血 当时没有在意 后来想想是不是要打破伤风啊！？ 大神在吗？

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you get a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the last 5 years. Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with gauze and a bandage.  Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种。继续每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用纱布和绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Avoid iodine. Does not appear to need stiches.  If tetanus not up to date would recommend updating.  Can treat with local wound care, keep clean with dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 避免使用碘，不需要缝合。如果破伤风疫苗未更新，建议补接种。可以进行局部伤口护理，保持清洁，并用干敷料包扎。

responses.content_en: The wound itself appears to have stopped bleeding and healed appropriately but there is a surrounding area of green/brown dried discharge which may have been dried blood/dirt. I would recommend cleaning the area with saline and dressing it. If you had your tetanus shot recently (last 5 years) then you do not need another vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口本身似乎已经止血并正常地愈合。但周围有绿色/棕色的已干燥的分泌物，可能是已干燥的血液/污垢。我建议用生理盐水清洁该部位和包扎好。如果你最近（过去5年）接种了破伤风疫苗，那么你就不需要再接种疫苗了。

query_title_en: For those who understand please take a look, is this pus discharge caused by the dressing
query_title_zh: 请懂的人帮忙看下，这是不是敷料的作用导致的流脓
query_content_en: My mother scraped off the skin when she fell. It did not recovere after 10ish day painting the wound with betadine. I took her to the hospital. The doctor said they would need to remove the scar. The facility doctor from our reigion said they are unable to treat the wound, and direct us the the faclity at this WeChat.
query_content_zh: 我妈本来是摔破皮，擦碘伏擦了十几天还没好，我就带她去医院看，医生说要挖掉结痂皮，我们这里小地方的医院的医生说没办法处理，就叫我们去微信里这个

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a General Surgery or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您看普通外科或整形外科的专家，讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be relatively large soft tissue injury with delayed healing.  The wound may heal over time by secondary intention with granulation and significant scarring.  Does not appear to be overt evidence of secondary infection at this time.  For chronic wound care, you should keep the wound clean, monitor for signs of infection, and cover with Xeroform/Adaptic and topical antibiotic ointment.  May require surgical revision for scar removal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是较大的软组织损伤，愈合延迟。伤口可能通过开放性愈合形成肉芽组织，并伴有明显的瘢痕。目前无明显的继发感染迹象。对于慢性伤口护理，你应保持伤口清洁，监测感染迹象，并用Xeroform/Adaptic和局部抗生素软膏。如需去除瘢痕，可能需要手术。

responses.content_en: Unclear if the color is due to the betadine use, would recommend debridement to evaluate the wound further as this may not heal spontaneously.
responses.content_zh: 不清楚颜色是否是由于使用聚维酮碘造成的。建议清理伤口、以进一步评估。伤口可能不可以自然愈合。

query_title_en: Can I walk in this condition?
query_title_zh: 这个刚能走路吗
query_content_en: Stitches removed two days ago, had three stitches. Can I walk now in this condition?
query_content_zh: 刚拆线两天，缝了三针，现在这个情况能走路了吗？

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing well and you should be able to walk as long as it does not cause you pain.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合良好，只要不会引起疼痛，您应该可以行走。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing well after suture removal.  There is a small chance of wound dehiscence with extreme range of motion and care should be taken with ambulation.  Would recommend using topical antibiotic ointment and avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, iodine, or hydrogen peroxide.
responses.content_zh: 拆线后伤口愈合良好，但在进行大范围动作时有轻微的伤口裂开风险，行走时需小心。建议使用局部抗生素软膏，并避免酒精、碘或双氧水等干燥剂。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to have come together, I would recommend applying dressing to the wound, however I think you can start to walk. Limit friction to the area and/or scrubbing the area aggressively.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎已经愈合，我建议给伤口敷上包扎料。但我认为你可以开始走路了。减少该部位发生摩擦、和/或减少用力擦洗该区域。

query_title_en: I got six shots of anti-biotics on my butt since I was fallen from the scooter, and I have to take medicine everyday.
query_title_zh: 骑车摔伤打了6次屁股消炎针。天天吃消炎药。
query_content_en: What should I do? It has been forteen days but no heal.
query_content_zh: 14天了还是这样子。该怎么办。

responses.content_en: It may take up to 8 weeks for healing but there is no sign of infection at this time. Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口可能需要长达8周才能愈合，但目前没有感染迹象。请继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并用绷带包扎。

responses.content_en: No overt signs of secondary infection.  Wound appears to be ulcerated with some granulation tissue present.  Given that it appears to be on the foot it would likely require a lengthy period of time for healing.  To promote healing, avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  Keep the area covered with a nonadherent dressing and apply topical antibiotic ointment to the wound.  You may change the dressing daily.
responses.content_zh: 无明显的继发感染迹象。伤口表现为溃疡，并有部分肉芽组织。由于伤口位于足部，预计愈合时间较长。为促进愈合，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。保持伤口覆盖无粘连敷料，并在伤口上涂抹抗生素软膏，可每日更换敷料。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be healing well at this time, this will take some time to heal. I would recommend soaking the area in warm soapy water to help prevent infection.  I would dress the wound with bacitracin ointment and xeroform dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口现在似乎痊愈得很好，这需要一些时间才能完在愈合。我建议将伤口浸泡在温肥皂水中，以帮助预防感染。我会用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料包扎伤口。

query_title_en: It has been ten days since my finger tips was cut
query_title_zh: 指头切伤10天了
query_content_en: What should I do if I feel pus inside
query_content_zh: 感觉里边有脓水怎么办

responses.content_en: If there is pus within the wound, I recommend that you go into the hospital to have the wound re-opened as the pus needs to be washed out and antibiotics given.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口内有脓，我建议您去医院将伤口重新打开，因为脓需要清洗并且需要使用抗生素。

responses.content_en: Unable to give specific recommendations given the poor quality of the pictures however it appears that there is a laceration to the finger pad.  If the you are feeling significant pain, pressure, and fluctuance, there is likely a developing felon which will need incision and drainage as well as oral antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 由于图片质量较差，无法提供具体建议，但似乎有指腹的撕裂伤。如果你感到明显的疼痛、压力和波动感，可能是正在形成的指端脓肿，需进行切开引流并使用口服抗生素。

responses.content_en: I would recommend soaking your finger in warm soapy water several times a day to help with the drainage from the wound. You would also likely benefit from incision and drainage of the wound.If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你每天用温肥皂水浸泡手指几次，以帮助伤口引流。切开伤口和引流对你可能有帮助。如果你的破伤风疫苗已過期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: Need help
query_title_zh: 求解阿，
query_content_en: I applied erythromycin ointment. How long will this kind of wound take to heal? It's been three days since I fell.
query_content_zh: 我抹的红霉素软膏，像这样的创伤多久能好阿，摔完过了三天了。

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. It may take up to 6-8 weeks for healing. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。愈合可能需要6至8周。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be secondarily infected but would recommend cleaning wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing dressing.  Tetanus should be updated if not up to date.  Will take multiple weeks to heal and there will likely be scarring.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有继发感染，但建议每天用温肥皂水清洗三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。愈合可能需要数周，并且可能会留下疤痕。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be infected, and topical erythromycin may not be sufficient. Please see a physician in person to determine whether the wound would benefit from incision and drainage, if there is infection in the joint space, and if oral antibiotics are warranted.
responses.content_zh: 这个伤口似乎已受感染了。外敷使用红霉素可能不足够了。请亲自去看医生，以确定伤口是否需要切口和引流、关节间隙是否有感染，以及是否需要口服抗生素。

query_title_en: Asking for advice
query_title_zh: 求解答
query_content_en: What's happening? What treatment options are there? I moved house a couple of days ago and have been walking a lot. The swelling has gotten worse, and now it’s extremely painful.
query_content_zh: 这个是啥毛病，想问问有啥治疗方法，我前两天搬家，跑路比较多，就越来越肿了，现在简直太疼了

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as you may need treatment with incision and drainage as well as antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心接受进一步检查，您可能需要接受切开引流治疗以及使用抗生素。

responses.content_en: Given the swelling to the toe as well as the redness, there is concern for development of a paronychia which is an infection of the toenail which typically requires incision and drainage.  You may try conservative management with soaking the affected digit in warm soapy water 3-5 times a day for 10 to 15 minutes at a time which may soften the cuticle and allow for spontaneous drainage.  However, if symptoms are getting worse, you likely need incision and drainage.
responses.content_zh: 由于脚趾的肿胀和发红，需留意甲沟炎的发生，这是一种指甲感染，通常需要切开引流。你可尝试保守治疗，将患趾浸泡在温肥皂水中，每天3-5次，每次10至15分钟，以软化甲缘并促进自发引流。然而，如果症状加重，可能需要切开引流。

responses.content_en: This appears to be paronychia to your nail that may benefit from incision and drainage to the area. You should soak the finger in warm soapy water to help with wound drainage and prevent infection.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是指甲的甲沟炎，伤口切开和引流可能对此有帮助。你应该把手指浸在温肥皂水中，以帮助伤口引流、防止感染

query_title_en: Can someone take a look to see if this require treatment?
query_title_zh: 各位大神看看这个需要处理不
query_content_en: I got crash onto an advertisement board that has a metal lining. Do I need suture or special treatment? How likely will it leave a scar
query_content_zh: 被一个铁边的广告牌撞的，需要缝针或者特别处理吗，以后留疤的几率大不大

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar. Since it is located on the face, sutures may help decrease this possibility. I would recommend a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the past 5 years. Use sunscreen or wear a hat when outdoors to minimize sun exposure to the area.
responses.content_zh: 很难判断是否会留下疤痕。由于伤口位于面部，缝合可能有助于降低留下疤痕的可能性。如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种。外出时使用防晒霜或戴帽子，以尽量减少该区域的日晒暴露。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully appreciate if there is any underlying laceration or just an abrasion present.  If there is a laceration with tissue gapping, would recommend suture repair for scar minimization.  Otherwise local wound care with topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing is likely sufficient.  Gentle cleaning of the wound with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily is recommended.  For scar minimization, avoid UV exposure for up to 1 year.
responses.content_zh: 目前无法明确判断是撕裂伤还是仅为擦伤。如果是有组织受损的撕裂伤，建议缝合以减少瘢痕形成。否则局部伤口护理、使用抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料可能就足够了。建议每天1至3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗伤口。为减少瘢痕形成，建议在一年内避免紫外线照射。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say based on the image provided, based on the depth of the injury you may either need sutures or a adhesive glue to bring the edges of the wound together. It may leave a scar, I would recommend avoiding sunlight to the area and applying appropriate sunscreen to reduce the likelihood of scarring.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难说。根据受伤的深度，你可能需要缝合或使用粘合剂将伤口边缘粘在一起。它可能会留下疤痕，我建议避免阳光照射到该区域，并涂抹适当的防晒霜以减少疤痕的可能性

query_content_en: There is pus formation inside this wound. I don't want to go to the hospital, how should I treat it?
query_content_zh: 这个有伤口里边化脓了，我不想医院，怎么么处理

responses.content_en: If there is pus within the wound, I recommend that you go into the hospital to have the wound re-opened as the pus needs to be washed out and antibiotics given.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口内有脓，我建议您去医院重新打开伤口，因为脓需要清洗并且需要使用抗生素。

responses.content_en: Need more clinical context given the appearance of this wound.  Appears to be surgical in nature and if there is a recent operation and if noting pus formation, there would be concern for deeper infection.  Additional clinical questions that would be important include: is there any swelling present, systemic signs of infection including fever, chills, and what is the range of motion at the joint as well as what the underlying surgical procedure was.
responses.content_zh: 根据伤口的外观，需要更多的临床背景信息。伤口看起来像是手术造成的，如果近期接受了手术并注意到有脓液形成，则需警惕更深层的感染。需要进一步了解的临床问题包括：是否存在肿胀、是否有系统性感染症状（如发热、寒战）、关节的活动范围，以及具体的手术情况。

responses.content_en: If you do not want to go to the hospital and the wound is spontaneously draining, I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water several times a day to help with softening the skin to improve wound drainage.
responses.content_zh: 如果你不想去医院和伤口可以自行排液，我建议每天用温肥皂水浸泡几次，以帮助软化皮肤，改善伤口排液。

query_content_en: The skin on my hand got scraped, and now the wound looks like this. What should I do?
query_content_zh: 手上擦破皮后伤口变这样了，怎么办？

responses.content_en: The wound looks like there may be some pus.  I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as this may be a sign of an infection.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来可能有一些脓液。我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心接受进一步评估，因为这可能是感染的迹象。

responses.content_en: Appears to be a post traumatic callus.  Keep the area moisturised and do rang of motion exercises to prevent it from getting stiff.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是创伤后形成的胼胝。保持局部湿润，并进行关节活动练习以防止僵硬。

responses.content_en: There appears to be an area of infection in the finger, that would benefit from drainage and potentially antibiotics. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether the infection has spread to the area in the joint given the infection is over the joint.
responses.content_zh: 手指似乎有一部份已受感染。进行引流和服用抗生素对你可能有帮助。因为感染是在关节上，我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定感染是否已经扩散到关节部位。

query_title_en: It is my first time posting here. Can anyone please take a look?
query_title_zh: 第一次在这里发帖 都进来看看嘛
query_content_en: I fell from riding a vehicle. For this type of injury, do I need to go to the hospital for bandaging? Truthly speaking, it hurts so bad that I cannot sleep
query_content_zh: 骑车摔倒了 像这样的需要去医院包扎吗？说实话真的好痛 痛的都睡不着

responses.content_en: If your pain cannot be controlled with over the counter medication, feel free to go to the hospital. Otherwise, continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 如果您的疼痛无法通过非处方药物控制，请前往医院。否则，继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓液分泌等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Appear to be multiple injuries to arm and palm with abrasions to skin.  Given mechanism of injury, you would likely benefit from evaluation for underlying fracture.  Wounds do not appear to be amenable to suture repair however local wound care, cleaning, and dressing with topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.  Would recommend updating tetanus shot if not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 手臂和手掌处有多处伤口，伴有皮肤擦伤。考虑到受伤机制，建议接受评估是否存在骨折。伤口不适合缝合，但可局部伤口护理、清洁，并使用局部抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料包扎。如破伤风疫苗未更新，建议补接种。

responses.content_en: I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water to promote drainage from the wound. I would recommend also dressing the wound with bacitracin ointment and xeroform dressing. If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend receiving a tetanus vaccination. It may be beneficial to go to the hospital for in person education and management of the wound.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水浸泡伤口，以促进伤口引流。我还建议用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料包扎伤口。如果你的破伤风疫苗已逾期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。亲自去医院、接受有关伤口的知织和护理会对你有帮助。

query_title_en: What's wrong with my wound?
query_title_zh: 我这怎么了
query_content_en: Why hasn't it scabbed after several days?
query_content_zh: 怎么好几天都不结痂

responses.content_en: Not all injuries scab. Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. If you are concerned about an infection or have other symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding, consult a doctor and have this evaluated in-person.
responses.content_zh: 并非所有伤口都会结痂。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果您担心感染或出现其他症状，如发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血，请咨询医生并进行面对面的检查。

responses.content_en: Difficult to visualize the wound however appears to be a small avulsion/ulceration on the dorsal surface of the thumb.  Would recommend avoiding any drying agents such as iodine, hydrogen peroxide, or alcohol as this will impede healing.  You may use topical antibiotic ointments and nonadherent dressing.  Please clean the wound with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily.
responses.content_zh: 图片质量有限，伤口难以清晰辨认，但似乎是拇指背部的小撕脱伤或溃疡。建议避免使用碘、过氧化氢或酒精等干燥剂，以免影响愈合。你可以使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料，每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口1至3次。

responses.content_en: There appears to be some mild discoloration to this wound, unclear if this is due to a cleaning ointment you have applied. Given that it is an area that is highly mobile, this will take additional time to heal and will not easily scab over.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎有轻微的色变；不清楚这是否是由于你涂了清洁软膏。鉴于这部位活动频繁，这将需要额外的时间来愈合，并且不容易结痂。

query_title_en: Is this okay? It feels like my skin hasn’t healed properly.
query_title_zh: 这样没事么，总感觉皮肤没有愈合好

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing well. It may take up to 6-8 weeks for full recovery.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合良好，完全康复可能需要6至8周的时间。

responses.content_en: Appears to be some discoloration from suture repair and healing process.  Can do tissue massage and use scar cream to help with healing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口在缝合和愈合过程中出现了一些颜色变化。可以按摩组织并使用疤痕修复霜来帮助愈合。

responses.content_en: Your laceration appears to be healing very well. This is what typical wound progression would appear like, we would recommend continuiung to keep the area clean and away from sunlight.
responses.content_zh: 你的伤口似乎愈合得很好。这就是典型的伤口进展情况，我们建议继续保持该部位清洁，和远离日照。

query_title_en: help, can my nail still grow?
query_title_zh: 求助这个还能长指甲吗？

responses.content_en: Your nail will likely grow back but may take up to 6 months.
responses.content_zh: 您的指甲很可能会重新长出来，但可能需要长达6个月的时间。

responses.content_en: Significant nail injury with possible injury to the nailbed.  Would likely recommend removal of the remaining part of the nail and stenting of the nailbed to encourage proper nail regrowth.  If there is injury to the germinal matrix at the nailbed, the fingernail may not regrow.  Would recommend keeping covered with antibiotic ointment and a nonadherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 指甲受伤严重，可能涉及甲床损伤。建议移除剩余部分指甲，并支撑甲床以促进指甲再生。如果甲床的生长基质受损，指甲可能无法重新生长。建议使用抗生素软膏并用无粘连敷料覆盖。

responses.content_en: There appears to be an underlying hematoma underneath your nail, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to have the nail completely removed to promote further healing of the wound. Depending on where the damaged the nail bed occurred, it is possible that the nail may not grow back.
responses.content_zh: 你的指甲下面似乎有一个表面下的血肿。我建议你亲自去看医生，把指甲完全拔掉，以促进伤口的进一步愈合。根据甲床受损的位置，指甲可能不会长回来。

query_title_en: I bumped myself on the table corner, and almost lacerated the skin
query_title_zh: 磕到桌子棱角了，差一点破了

responses.content_en: Apply ice packs to the area for 20-30 minutes 2-3 times a day. Go to the hospital if you develop symptoms such as headache, dizziness, lightheadedness, nausea, vomiting, confusion, lethargy, feeling faint or actually pass out.
responses.content_zh: 每天将冰袋敷在患处20-30分钟，2-3次。如果出现头痛、头晕、昏厥感、恶心、呕吐、意识混乱、嗜睡、虚弱或晕倒等症状，请立即去医院。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be a laceration present however there does appear to be a hematoma.  Recommend conservative treatment with ice as needed.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 似乎没有撕裂伤，但存在血肿。建议保守治疗，需要時冰敷。避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。

responses.content_en: This appears to be a superficial hematoma, which should heal on its own, would likely benefit from warm compresses. This could be due to an underlying injury, I would recommend being evaluated if you are having any additional symptoms.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是浅层血肿，应该会自行愈合，热敷可能有帮助。这可能是由于下面有伤损。如果你有任何其他症状，我建议你由医护人员来进行评估。

query_title_en: I fell and braced myself with my hand, and now there's a bump. Can someone tell me what this is?
query_title_zh: 摔倒手撑地的时候手上挤出来个包 各位帮忙看看是怎么回事
query_content_en: It's the area marked in the red circle.
query_content_zh: 就是红圈的位置。

responses.content_en: This is likely a cyst caused from the trauma. If it causes you pain or discomfort, you can see a hand specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是由外伤引起的囊肿。如果它给您带来疼痛或不适，您可以去看手部专科医生，讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be infected.  Likely post-traumatic seroma.  Would need more context to understand further.  Is it firm, fluid filled, how is range of motion at the wrist/hand.
responses.content_zh: 看起来没有感染迹象，可能是创伤后积液。需要更多信息来进一步判断。请确认伤口是否坚硬、是否有液体积聚，以及手腕/手部的活动范围。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on these images however there does appear to be a mildly raised area over the wrist. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether you need further imaging to evaluate for underlying fracture, infection, etc in the setting of a fall onto your hand.
responses.content_zh: 根据这些图像很确定情况。然而，手腕上似乎确实有一个轻微凸起的区域。这次跌倒牵涉到手部，我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定你是否需要进一步的造像来评估潜在的骨折、感染等状况。

query_title_en: Can someone help me see if this is almost healed?
query_title_zh: 谁能帮我看一下，不知道是快好了
query_content_en: Can someone help me see if this is almost healed or getting worse?
query_content_zh: 谁能帮我看一下，不知道是快好了还是严重了！

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing well. But consult a doctor if you have symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like drainage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合良好，但如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓液分泌等症状，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Appears to be chronic healing wound with scabbing present.  No secondary signs of infection.  Would recommend avoiding any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, and iodine.  You may do local wound care with emollients and topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正緩慢愈合，有结痂，但无感染的迹象。建议避免使用酒精、双氧水和碘等干燥剂。你可进行局部伤口护理，使用润肤剂和局部抗生素软膏，并搭配无粘连敷料。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be healing appropriately, it is forming granulation tissue/Scabbing over. If the redness around the area continues to worsen, I would recommend going to the hospital to be evaluated by provider.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合，肉芽组织/结痂正在形成。如果该区域周围的发红情况继续恶化，我建议去医院接受提医护人员的评估。

query_title_en: How does this injury look, everyone please take a look
query_title_zh: 这个伤情怎么样，大家看看

responses.content_en: You have a hematoma due to the injury. Continue resting, icing, wear compression socks or stockings or use an ACE wrap and elevating the leg when sitting or sleeping. It may take up to 8 weeks for healing.
responses.content_zh: 您因受伤而出现血肿。请继续休息、冰敷、穿着压缩袜或使用弹力绷带，并在坐着或睡觉时抬高腿部。伤口可能需要长达8周才能完全愈合。

responses.content_en: Appears to be significant bruising and swelling to the medial malleolus of the ankle with overlying abrasion.  No signs of secondary infection however given the amount of bruising there would be concern for underlying malleolus fracture.  Would recommend x-rays to evaluate for joint injury.
responses.content_zh: 内踝部位有明显的瘀伤和肿胀，伴有表面擦伤。目前无继发感染的迹象，但由于瘀伤的严重程度，需考虑内踝骨折风险。建议进行X光检查以评估关节损伤情况。

responses.content_en: This appears to be a superficial abrasion to the leg that appears to be healing well spontaneously.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是腿部的表面擦伤，似乎可以很好地自行愈合。

query_content_en: It’s been ten days since I got stitches on my leg. Does this kind of stitch need to be removed? I didn’t ask the doctor after the surgery nor the doctor mentioned it. And I can’t reach the doctor over the phone now.
query_content_zh: 吧里大神，腿伤缝合十天了，这种线用不用拆线啊！做完手术我也没问医生也没提...现在打医生电话也打不通

responses.content_en: The stiches placed do not dissolve. I would recommend that you go back to the hospital to have the stitches removed.
responses.content_zh: 缝合的线不会自行溶解。我建议你回医院取出缝线。

responses.content_en: Unclear location and what the initial wound was.  Was this a surgical wound or traumatic wound.  These appear to be silk/nylon sutures that will need to be removed but unclear based on wound description
responses.content_zh: 伤口的具体位置和初始情况不明确。不确定是手术伤口还是外伤。缝线似乎是丝线或尼龙线，需要拆除，但根据现有伤口描述无法完全确定。

responses.content_en: Assuming the purple color of the skin is due to a dye from surgery, the wound appears to have come together but it does not look like these sutures are necessarily dissolvable based on the image. I would recommend being seen in person by any physician to have these sutures evaluated for removal.
responses.content_zh: 假设皮肤的紫色是由手术中的染色物做成的，伤口似乎已经愈合。但根据图像，这些缝合线不一定是可自然溶解的。我建议你亲自去看医生，以检查这些缝合线是否可以拆除。

query_content_en: Got hit by a workpiece while working two days ago. Any doctors here? How should I handle it? Got some painkillers and circulation medicine from the hospital.
query_content_zh: 前天干活被工件砸伤了，有大夫吗，看看怎么处理，去医院开了一点止痛药，活血化淤的药

responses.content_en: Continue taking your medications as prescribed. Consider getting an x-ray to rule out a fracture if this was not done previously. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge as those are signs of infection.
responses.content_zh: 继续按照处方服用药物。如果之前没有过，可以考虑做X光检查以排除骨折的可能性。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物等感染迹象，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Large subungal hematoma.  Should obtain xrays to rule out fracture and likely needs trephination for pain control
responses.content_zh: 指甲下血肿，建议拍X光以排除骨折的可能，并可能需要穿刺减压以缓解疼痛。

responses.content_en: Given the color of the fingernail, there is concern for compromise of the blood vessels under your fingernail and potential necrosis of the nail. I would recommend being seen in person by a physician for debridement/potential removal of the nail to help with healing and prevent further damage to the nail.
responses.content_zh: 鉴于指甲的颜色，我担心指甲下的血管会受损、指甲可能会坏死。我建议你亲自去看医生、进行伤口清创/或移除指甲，以帮助愈合并防止指甲进一步受损。

query_title_en: Seeking help!
query_title_zh: 求助
query_content_en: After being pinched by a crayfish, a piece of my fingernail is missing.
query_content_zh: 被小龙虾夹过之后 指甲怎么少了一块

responses.content_en: No further intervention is needed at this time. The nail will slowly grow out over time but it may take up to 6 months.
responses.content_zh: 目前不需要进一步的介入。指甲会慢慢长出来，但可能需要长达6个月的时间。

responses.content_en: Can we warm soapy soak of the area three times a day but does not appear to violate the nailbed.  Nail will have to grow out.  No evidence of subungal hematoma.
responses.content_zh: 我们可以每天用温肥皂水浸泡患处三次，但看起来没有影响到指甲床。指甲需要自然长出，没有甲下血肿的迹象。

responses.content_en: This appears to be damage to your lunula or a portion of your fingernail with the crayfish bite. Based on this photo it is hard to say whether this has penetrated deeper into the skin but at this time it does not appear to be infected nor is there underlying bleeding. Please keep the area clean as this heals, which may take months.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是小龙虾咬伤后对你的甲半月或指甲的一部分造成的损伤。根据这张照片，很难说它是否已经深入皮肤，但此时它似乎没有感染，下面也没有出血。在愈合过程中，请保持该部位清洁，这可能需要几个月的时间。

query_title_en: A few days ago, I had a motorcycle accident, and the doctor said that a skin graft would cost more than RMB 20,000. Friends, do you think I need a skin graft? [picture]
query_title_zh: 摩托车摔伤了，医生说植皮要2万多，病友来看看需要植皮吗【图片
query_content_en: A few days ago, I had a motorcycle accident, and the doctor said that a skin graft would cost more than RMB 20,000. Friends, do you think I need a skin graft? [picture]
query_content_zh: 摩托车摔伤了，医生说植皮要2万多，病友来看看需要植皮吗【图片】【图片】

responses.content_en: A skin graft would allow for quicker healing, restore function and improve the appearance of the area but would not be mandatory. But the choice is ultimately up to you if the procedure is very costly.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤移植可以加速愈合，恢复功能并改善该区域的外观，但并非必需。最终的选择取决于您自己，尤其如果手术费用较高的情况下。

responses.content_en: Will likely require surgical revision to heal properly.  Given location, could lead to joint contracture and decreased rang of motion at leg.  Does not appear to be infected.
responses.content_zh: 可能需要外科修复才能愈合。由于伤口位置，可能会导致关节挛缩和腿部活动范围受限。目前没有感染迹象。

responses.content_en: The skin appears to be necrotic in nature (essentially the overlying skin is dead). A skin graft would help the likelihood of improvement as necrotic skin has a high likelihood of getting infected which could then cause a systemic infection. I also would recommend a skin graft to help with healing but it is up to you to decide based on the risks and benefits discussed by the surgeon.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤似乎已是坏死的（基本上覆盖的皮肤是死的）。皮肤移植将有助于情况的改善；因为坏死皮肤很大机会受到感染，从而导致全身感染。 我还建议进行皮肤移植以帮助愈合，但这取决于你和外科医生讨论的风险和效益来作决定。

query_content_en: I got a scrape wound from a shattered glass bottle. I went to the hospital and the doctor cleansed the wound. According to the doctor, both suture and no suture were an option, so I choose not to have the wound sutured. Can I ask everyone, how long does would like this will recover.
query_content_zh: 玻璃瓶碎了被划伤，去医院医生清理了一下伤口，说缝不缝都行，然后我就没缝，想问下大家，这样的伤口多长时间能好。

responses.content_en: If the wound is not sutured, it may take up to 6-8 weeks for full recovery.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口没有缝合，完全康复可能需要6至8周的时间。

responses.content_en: Would heal more quickly with sutures given tissue gapping.  Will take multiple weeks to granulate in without suture repair.  If wound is over 24 ould would not recommend suture repair.   Clean wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 由于组织裂开，缝合会加快愈合速度。如果不缝合，可能需要数周才能長出肉芽。如果伤口超过24小时，不建议缝合。每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。

responses.content_en: The bottom layer of the skin appears to be healing appropriately given the no sutures and does not appear infected at this time. It will take some time for the upper layers of the skin to heal, from weeks to months. If any redness of the skin develops around the area, I would see a physician in person.
responses.content_zh: 在没有缝合的情况下，皮肤的底层似乎在正常地愈合；现时似乎没有感染。皮肤上层愈合需要一些时间，从几周到几个月不等。如果该部位周围出现任何皮肤发红，我会亲自去看医生。

query_title_en: Got a scrape on my back, now it looks like this.
query_title_zh: 背上被蹭了一下，然后成这样了。
query_content_en: What medication can help it heal quickly?
query_content_zh: 用什么药好的快？

responses.content_en: Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying moisturizing ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹保湿药膏并用绷带包扎。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing with granulation tissue.  To minimize scarring, avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  Keep the area moisturized and covered.  After the wound has healed, to minimize scar formation, avoid UV exposure and use SPF containing lotions
responses.content_zh: 伤口显示有肉芽组织愈合的迹象。为减少瘢痕，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。保持局部湿润并覆盖伤口。在伤口愈合后，为减少瘢痕形成，避免紫外线照射，并使用含SPF的护肤品。

responses.content_en: I would recommend mildly cleaning the area with warm soapy water and dressing the area with bacitracin ointment and xeroform dressing.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水轻柔地清洁该区域；并用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料包扎。

query_title_en: Does the wound on the front of the shin heal especially slowly? I fell and hurt my right shin on July 21.
query_title_zh: 小腿胫前伤口是不是好起来特别慢啊？7月21日摔跤割裂了右小腿
query_content_en: Does the wound on the front of the shin heal especially slowly? I fell and cut my right shin on July 21. Got stitches removed 14 days after surgery, rested at home, then noticed necrosis, went back for debridement and VSD for a week. After a month of natural healing, there’s still a 0.5x0.5 cm granulation tissue. Now using hydrocolloid dressing. Any advice?
query_content_zh: 小腿胫前伤口是不是好起来特别慢啊？7月21日摔跤割裂了右小腿胫前肌肉。手术14天后拆线回家休息，一周不到发现伤口皮肤坏死，回院除黑痂清创➕VSD负压一周。然后就是自然长了一个月还剩0.5X0.5厘米黄豆大小肉芽不愈，现在在用水胶体敷料。病友们有经验传授吗？

responses.content_en: The wound is likely healing slow due to the severity of the injury and not from the location. Continue performing wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily then cover with the dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口愈合缓慢可能是由于伤势的严重程度，而不是因为位置原因。请继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗患处，然后覆盖敷料。

responses.content_en: Chronic appearing wound after laceration with sutures.  No overt signs of secondary infection.  Likely delayed wound healing.  Would recommend continued follow-up with wound care including avoiding any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine and using wet-to-dry dressings or Xeroform/Adaptic changed daily.
responses.content_zh: 缝合后的伤口呈慢性状态，无明显继发感染迹象，但可能会出现延迟愈合。建议继续伤口护理随访，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂，并使用湿敷-干敷或Xeroform/Adaptic，每日更换。

responses.content_en: This area appears to be healing appropriately, with the appropriate timeline.  I would recommend dressing the area to prevent trauma or friction to the area to promote wound healing.
responses.content_zh: 这部位似乎以正常时间速度愈合中。我建议对该部位进行包扎，以防止对它造成创伤或摩擦，从而促进伤口愈合。

query_content_en: I accidentally kicked and broke a glass that had mice, snakes, lizards, and rabbits crawling over it. Will this wound cause diseases like plague, tetanus, or rabies?
query_content_zh: 我不小心把玻璃踢碎了，那个玻璃有老鼠、蛇、蜥蜴、兔子爬过，这么样的伤口，请问会得鼠疫，破伤风，狂犬病等疾病吗

responses.content_en: It would be unlikely to you to get rabies or plague unless you were bit by the animal or insect itself. I would recommend a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the past 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 除非您被动物或昆虫本身咬伤，否则感染狂犬病或鼠疫的可能性很小。如果您在过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种。

responses.content_en: Unable to give full recommendation based on clinical contacts.  Unclear if this was wearing shoes or if this injury occurred while barefoot.  Does not have evidence of overt secondary infection however would recommend updating tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 无法基于当前临床信息提供完整的建议。不清楚在受伤时是否穿鞋。尽管无明显继发感染的迹象，但如果破伤风疫苗未更新，建议进行补接种。

responses.content_en: I would recommend receiving a tetanus vaccine if your tetanus is not up-to-date.  I would continue to monitor the area for infection as it continues to heal.
responses.content_zh: 如果你的破伤风疫苗已过期，我建议你接种新的破伤风疫苗。在伤口愈合期中，我会继续留意该部位的感染情况。

query_content_en: Friends, I need some advice. The morning before last, I hit my little toe on the bed frame and scraped off a layer of skin. How can I do for it to heal faster? I am a worker, and I go to work every day. My worker shoes are not breathable.
query_content_zh: 请问下大家，前天早上小脚趾撞床脚了，上面挂掉了一层皮，怎样处理好的快一点，本人工人一枚，每天上班，劳保鞋还不透气

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be partial avulsion of the toenail with underlying hematoma.  Does not appear to be injury to the nailbed/base of the nail.  Would recommend bulky dry gauze dressing, buddy taping to the adjacent toe, and hard sole shoe to avoid significant bending of the digit.  Toenail will likely have to regrow.  No evidence of secondary infection
responses.content_zh: 伤口表现为部分趾甲撕脱，并伴有血肿，但甲床或甲根未见受伤迹象。建议使用厚干纱布敷料、邻趾固定带、硬底鞋以避免脚趾过度弯曲。趾甲可能需要重新生长。目前无继发感染迹象。

responses.content_en: I would recommend getting different shoes if possible to allow for less friction/trauma to the area. There is a small hematoma to the area that should likely heal on its own with time.
responses.content_zh:
如果可能的话，我建议换掉鞋子，以减少对该区域的摩擦/创伤。
该部位有一个小血肿，过了一些时间，它很可能会自行愈合。

query_title_en: Is there a surgeon? Can someone help me figure out how to make this wound heal? Thank you.
query_title_zh: 有没有外科医生啊?帮我看看我这个要这么弄才能愈合?谢谢唉，好
query_content_en: Is there a surgeon? Can someone help me figure out how to make this wound heal? Thank you. It's really troublesome.
query_content_zh: 有没有外科医生啊? 帮我看看我这个要这么弄才能愈合?谢谢 唉，好麻烦

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the hospital for imaging to rule out a fracture and treatment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往医院进行影像检查以排除骨折并接受治疗。

responses.content_en: Unable to fully visualize the wound on the attached picture however there does appear to be a laceration to the finger pad.  Unclear if injury to the fingernail.  Unclear as to the mechanism of injury or timing of injury.  Need further information to provide any recommendation
responses.content_zh: 无法完全看清图片中的伤口，但指腹似乎有撕裂伤，不清楚是否涉及指甲损伤。目前也不明确受伤的机制或时间，需要多一些信息才能提供建议。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen in person by a provider to allow for further assessment of the finger. It is unclear if there has been a partial amputation of your finger or underlying fracture.
responses.content_zh: 我建议由医护人员亲自检查，以便对手指进行进一步评估。目前尚不清楚你的手指是否有部分截肢、或表面下的骨折。

query_title_en: My fingernail was ripped off. Should I trim it or leave it alone? If I leave it alone, it will bleed a lot, but if I trim it, I'm afraid the nail will grow into the flesh later.
query_title_zh: 指甲盖被掀开了，我要剪掉还是合上啊  合上的话血流一大堆剪掉
query_content_en: My fingernail was ripped off. Should I trim it or leave it alone? If I leave it alone, it will bleed a lot, but if I trim it, I'm afraid the nail will grow into the flesh later.
query_content_zh: 指甲盖被掀开了，我要剪掉还是合上啊 合上的话血流一大堆剪掉又怕以后指甲长肉里

responses.content_en: I would recommend consulting with a doctor in-person if you would like to have the nail trimmed. Otherwise you can leave the nail alone as it is unlikely for it to grow into the flesh.
responses.content_zh: 如果您想修剪指甲，我建议您亲自咨询医生。否则，您可以不管它，因为指甲不太可能长入肉中。

responses.content_en: Injury appears to be partial amputation of fingertip.  Nail base appears in tact.  You should let the fingernail grow out and monitor for signs of ingrown nail.  Would not recommend nail removal at this point as this could cause injury to the nail base and restrict further nail growth.  You should do local wound care, soaking the finger in warm soapy water 3 times daily for 10 to 15 minutes at a time and applying topical antibiotic ointment with a nonadherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是部分手指尖的截断，但指甲基部完好。建议让指甲自然生长，并观察是否有甲沟炎的迹象。目前不建议拔除指甲，以免损伤指甲基部并影响其生长。建议每天用温肥皂水浸泡手指3次，每次10至15分钟，并涂抹抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to have the nail removed as the nail has been partially removed, and it is unclear based on the image but it is possible that the finger has been partially amputated as well which would require further management. The area requires cleaning with warm soapy water.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生。因为指甲已经被部分切除，要把指甲除掉；根据图像尚不清楚，但手指也可能被部分截肢。这将需要进一步的治理。该区域需要用温肥皂水清洁。

query_title_en: My hand got scraped and it seems serious. What should I do?
query_title_zh: xdm手磕破了，感觉有点严重，应该怎么办啊(Ｔ▽Ｔ)
query_content_en: Yesterday, I broke some glass while opening a package in the stairwell, and it cut my hand. Now I can slightly move all my fingers except my index finger. It seems like there's still a piece of glass in my index finger because it hurts a lot when I move it. The cut near my pinky has bone exposed but doesn’t hurt as much as my index finger. This morning, I saw bleeding on the scabbed index finger, and there's a bump that makes me think there's still glass inside. What should I do? I thought it would heal in a few days, but now it seems serious. Should I go to the hospital? Please help! (The first picture was taken after washing the wound at home and wiping it with alcohol wipes. The second is three hours later, the third is nine hours later, and the fourth and fifth were taken this morning. #surgical wound#
query_content_zh:
昨天在楼道里拆快递，一用力把楼道玻璃弄碎了，玻璃扎了一手。
现在出食指外的4个指头都可稍微活动，好像食指内还有一块玻璃，一动就特别疼。小指下的伤口可以见骨了，也没食指那的疼。早上起来看到结痂后的食指还淌血，还有一块凸起，个人感觉应该还有一块玻璃。
这会我应该怎么办啊(´-ωก`），本来感觉过几天就好了，但好像又很严重，用不用去医院什么的。
急求万能的吧友解答
（图一是回家水洗之后用酒精棉擦完后拍的，图二是过了3个小时，图三是9小时之后的，图四和图五是今天早上拍的食指）#外伤#

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest hospital for further evaluation if you are concerned that there is glass inside the wound.
responses.content_zh: 如果你担心伤口内有玻璃，我建议你去最近的医院进行进一步检查。

responses.content_en: Multiple lacerations with some appearing to need stiches if wound is less than 24 hours old.  If there is concern for glass, needs medical evaluation for imaging and washout.  Tetanus should be updated if not up to date
responses.content_zh: 有多处撕裂伤，有些如果在24小时内可能需要缝合。如果怀疑有玻璃碎片，需接受医学评估以进行影像检查和冲洗。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。

responses.content_en: Given the inability to move your index finger and the possibility of bone exposure and glass being present in your finger, I would strongly recommend you go to the hospital to receive further imaging of your hand to prevent an infection or further injury of your hand.
responses.content_zh: 鉴於你的食指无法移动、手指中可能有骨骼外露和玻璃，我强烈建议你去医院接受进一步的手部造像，以防止感染或手部进一步受伤。

query_content_en: I scraped and injured my foot while riding an electric bike. It's been 21 days, and the scab looks like this. I'm currently using iodophor and erythromycin ointment, but the scab hasn't come off yet. The doctor said it will heal slowly, but the exact time is uncertain. Does anyone have any good suggestions for a faster recovery?
query_content_zh: 骑电动车脚擦伤摔伤了，结痂21天成这样。目前是碘伏加红霉素软膏，还没脱痂。医生说慢慢恢复，具体时间不确定。各位友友们，有什么好的建议吗？能快速恢复的

responses.content_en: I would recommend stopping the iodoform and ointment as it would be best to allow the scab to dry out.
responses.content_zh: 我建议停止使用碘仿和软膏，最好让结痂自然干燥。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be fairly large with granulation tissue, scabbing and scarring present.  Will need extended period of time for healing.  Would recommend local wound care including gentle cleaning with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily, avoiding any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine, and using topical emollients, moisturizing agents, or topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  You may change the dressing daily.  Gentle range of motion exercises will help prevent contractures of the skin.
responses.content_zh: 伤口较大，伴有肉芽组织、结痂和疤痕，需要较长时间愈合。建议局部伤口护理，包括每天1至3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂，并使用局部润肤剂、保湿剂或局部抗生素软膏，搭配无粘连敷料。你可每日更换敷料。轻柔的关节活动有助于防止皮肤挛缩。

responses.content_en: I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water to help improve the drainage from the wound. I would also recommend continuing to apply the erythromycin ointment and applying a xeroform dressing to the wound. Given the depth of injury, this will likely take some time to heal.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水浸泡伤口，以帮助改善伤口的引流。我还建议继续使用红霉素软膏，并在伤口上涂抹XEROFORM包扎料。由於伤口颇深，这可能需要一些时间才能痊愈。

query_title_en: The stitches was removed at two occasions in the past 21 day. Will it reopen? Will it leave a large scar?
query_title_zh: 21天分两次拆线，这个还会不会裂开，会留下很大的疤痕吗？
query_content_en: The stitches was removed at two occasions in the past 21 day. Will it reopen? Will it leave a large scar?
query_content_zh: 21天分两次拆线，这个还会不会裂开，会留下很大的疤痕吗？

responses.content_en: The wound should hopefuly not reopen if the stitches were removed after the recommended time frame. It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar as it depends on how your body heals.
responses.content_zh: 如果缝线在建议的时间拆除，伤口应该不会重新裂开。是否会留下疤痕取决于您的身体愈合情况，难以确定。

responses.content_en: Large soft tissue wound status post suture repair with bruising noted around the repair site to the skin flap.  In regards to the question as to will it reopen and will leave a scar, there does not appear to be significant evidence of wound dehiscence however depending on the viability of the skin flap, how deep the wound was, and your underlying medical issues, this may result in delayed healing/poor healing with scar formation.  Given the extent of the wound there will be scar formation present.  Wound will likely need long-term wound care follow-up.
responses.content_zh: 大面积软组织伤口在缝合修复后，修复部位及皮瓣周围可见瘀伤。关于是否会重新裂开及是否会留下瘢痕的问题，目前没有明显的伤口裂开的迹象。然而，这取决于皮瓣的存活情况、伤口的深度以及你的基础健康状况，可能会导致愈合延迟或不良愈合，并有瘢痕形成。鉴于伤口的严重程度，预计会出现瘢痕。伤口可能需要长期的伤口护理随访。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to have healed well and has come together appropriately. I would avoid trauma to the area and friction to promote wound healing. It will likely leave a scar however I would reduce sun exposure to the area and apply sunscreen to reduce likelihood of scarring.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已长回、似乎愈合得很好。我会避免对该部位造成创伤和摩擦，以促进伤口愈合。它可能会留下疤痕，但我会减少该部位的阳光照射，并涂抹防晒霜以减少结疤。

query_title_en: My fingernail was removed by a doctor after being pinched by a V-belt. It's been almost a month. Will it heal?
query_title_zh: 电机三角带挤的，指甲被医生拔掉了，快一个月了，还能好吗
query_content_en: My fingernail was removed by a doctor after being pinched by a V-belt. It's been almost a month. Will it heal?
query_content_zh: 三角带挤的，指甲被医生拔掉了，快一个月了，还能好吗

responses.content_en: It can take up to 6 months for a nail to regrow.
responses.content_zh: 指甲可能需要6个月後才会重新生长。

responses.content_en: Significant injury to the distal phalange of the third finger.  Concerns that there are development of dry gangrene versus infection with significant eschar.  Would recommend medical evaluation
responses.content_zh: 第三指末节的伤情严重，有干性坏疽或感染并伴有大量焦痂的担忧。建议接受医学评估。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person as there is concern for necrosis at the tip of your finger.  You may need further debridement and management in person.
responses.content_zh: 顾虑到指尖可能坏死，我建议你亲自去看医生。你可能需要进一步伤口清创和亲身接受治理。

query_title_en: Sigh, bad luck.
query_title_zh: 唉，倒霉
query_content_en: Does this need medical attention? Any experts know?
query_content_zh: 这个需要就医吗？哪位大神知道？

responses.content_en: If you are having pain and it has been less than 24 hours, you can go to the nearest Urgent Care for evaluation and possible drainage. Otherwise you can take anti-inflammatory medicine to help with the pain
responses.content_zh: 如果您感到疼痛且距离受伤时间不到24小时，建议去最近的急诊中心评估并可能进行引流。或是您可以服用消炎药来缓解疼痛。

responses.content_en: Appears to be fairly large subungual hematoma to first toe.  Unable to visualize underneath the bandage if there is any laceration present.  Would recommend trephination of the toenail if pain is not tolerable.  Given the amount of hematoma underneath the toenail, the toenail may eventually fall off but will likely regrow.
responses.content_zh: 大脚趾下有较大的指甲下血肿。由于敷料覆盖，无法观察是否存在撕裂伤。如果疼痛难以忍受，建议进行指甲穿刺术。鉴于指甲下血肿的程度，指甲可能会脱落，但通常会重新生长。

responses.content_en: There appears to be a hematoma developing underneath your nail. Hernia will need to be removed by A provider, to prevent further swelling. I would also recommend removing that Band-Aid as it may be obstructing blood flow from your nail.
responses.content_zh: 你的指甲下面似乎有血肿。血肿需要护理人员者切除，以防止进一步肿胀。我还建议除掉创可贴，因为它可能会阻碍指甲的血液流动。

query_title_en: Anyone know?
query_title_zh: 有人知道吗
query_content_en: This is already on day five. How does this look right now. Do I need other medication to washout or apply to the wound?
query_content_zh: 已经是第五天了，现在这个样子是什么意思，还要用什么药来清洗或者敷着吗

responses.content_en: It appears to be healing and there is no sign of an infection. Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正在愈合，没有感染的迹象。继续进行伤口护理，使用肥皂和水清洗伤口区域，涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Need more context to know if this is a diabetic wound, pressure wound, or do to vascular insufficiency.  Appears to be a pressure ulcer with delayed healing.  Avoid alcohol, hydrogen peroxide and should do wet to dry dressing changes with topical antibiotic ointment. Likely needs podiatry follow up
responses.content_zh: 需要更多信息来判断是糖尿病伤口、压疮，还是血管功能不全所致。看起来像是愈合延迟的压疮。避免使用酒精和过氧化氢，应使用湿敷-干敷法进行换药，并涂抹抗生素软膏。建议后续进行足科随访。

responses.content_en: The bottom layer of the skin appears to be healing appropriately and does not appear infected at this time. It will take some time for the upper layers of the skin to heal. If any redness of the skin develops around the area, I would see a physician in person. At this time, you do not need to wash it out as it is attempting to heal.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤底层似乎在正常愈合，此时似乎没有感染。皮肤上层需要一些时间才能愈合。如果该部位周围出现任何皮肤发红，我会亲自去看医生。现时伤口正在愈合中，你不需要把它洗掉。

query_content_en: In March last year, my right big toenail was smashed off completely, and the muscle at the end of the toe detached with a slight bone fracture. Now, a year later, it's mostly healed, but the toenail looks like this, which confuses me. Why is part of the nail yellow? The muscle has reattached and healed.
query_content_zh: 去年3月份右脚大拇指指甲被砸伤，指甲完全脱落，指甲末端肌肉脱离，末梢轻微骨裂。现在一年了，基本恢复了，但是指甲长成这个样子，我就糊涂了。请问，半截发黄的指甲是什么情况？就是那部分肌肉脱离的，已经缝合愈合了。

responses.content_en: The yellowing of the nail may be due to trauma or a fungal infection. You can see your Primary Care physician for further evaluation and obtain treatment if it is due to a fungal infection.
responses.content_zh: 指甲发黄可能是由于创伤或真菌感染所致。您可以去看您的初级保健医生，接受进一步评估，若确认为真菌感染时就接受治疗。

responses.content_en: Given the report of the injury, there would likely be prolonged period of healing for continued nail regrowth.  If the nail is excessively thick or yellow, there may be a secondary fungal toenail infection that will require an extended period of treatment.
responses.content_zh: 根据受伤报告，指甲的重新生长可能需要较长时间。如果指甲过厚或发黄，可能存在继发性真菌感染，造成治疗时间延长。

responses.content_en: The tip of the nail may have been damaged in the trauma, although the deeper part of the nail may have healed, this will take some time to fully recover.There is also the possibility that the tip of the nail is infected with a fungal infection.  I would recommend buying a topical antifungal ointment to help manage this infection.
responses.content_zh: 指甲的较深部分可能已经愈合，但指甲尖可能在创伤中受损。这需要一些时间才能完全恢复。指甲尖也有可能感染到真菌。我建议购买一些外敷用的抗真菌软膏来帮助控制这种感染。

query_title_en: How can you treat accidental cut wound
query_title_zh: 意外割伤，这个怎么处理？
query_content_en: I cut myself accidently. The hospital did some imaging, there was no any appearant bone fracture, but told us the bone did injured slightly. We then did stiches. This area should not involve tendon and nerve right? The doctor was not so concerned, but I am afriad. They did not order any anti-inflammatory medications. Should I get some anti-inflammatory medication myself?
query_content_zh: 不小心割伤了，医院拍了片子，没有明显骨折，说是骨头稍微有点伤，然后缝合了几针，这个位置应该不涉及肌腱，神经之类的吧，医生说的轻轻松松，自己属实害怕……也不给开消炎药，要不要自己去买些消炎药服用？

responses.content_en: The cut would need to be deep to involve tendons or nerves. If you are able to move or feel sensation along the area, it is unlikely to have involved the tendons or nerves. If you are having pain or swelling, feel free to take anti-inflammatory medicine to help with your symptoms.
responses.content_zh: 切口需要足够深才会影响到肌腱或神经。如果您能够在该区域移动或感到触觉，通常不会涉及到肌腱或神经。如果您感到疼痛或肿胀，可以服用消炎药来缓解症状。

responses.content_en: Included picture is of large gapping laceration with exposed subcutaneous fat.  Wound appears deep and it is difficult to tell if there is muscle involvement.  The clinical question suggest that sutures were placed however there is no included image of sutures.  Also unclear in the description what is meant when they state that the bone was slightly injured.  Unable to give recommendation if there is tendon involvement without evaluation.  If concerned would recommend follow-up.
responses.content_zh: 图片显示的是一个较大的裂伤，皮下脂肪外露。伤口较深，难以判断是否涉及肌肉。临床描述中提到伤口可能已缝合，但没有包含缝合的图片。临床描述中提到骨头略微受伤，但描述不清，无法明确其含义。如果有肌腱受损的疑虑，需进一步评估后才能提供建议。如果担忧，建议随访。

responses.content_en: This wound does not appear to involve nerve or tendon based on the location of the injury and the structures that run in this area. If you do not have any anti-inflammatory medication, pick up some over-the-counter to help with pain management.
responses.content_zh: 根据损伤的位置和部位的结构，该伤口似乎不涉及神经或肌腱。如果你没有任何抗炎药，可以服用一些非处方药物来帮助控制疼痛。

query_title_en: It has been 20ish days, I don't know if it will recover back to what it used to be
query_title_zh: 20多天了，不知道能不能长回愿样

responses.content_en: It can take a wound 6-8 weeks for healing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口的愈合时间可能需要6-8周。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be a healing avulsion injury to the tip of the finger with some possible nail injury.  Will require multiple weeks of healing for granulation which appears to be occurring.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  May use topical emollients and moisturizing creams to help soften skin.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是手指尖的撕脱伤，可能伴有指甲损伤。愈合可能需要数周，肉芽组织正在逐渐形成。避免使用酒精、过氧化氢或碘等干燥剂，可以用润肤剂和保湿霜来软化皮肤。

responses.content_en: Unclear what caused this injury, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person for a incision and drainage if there is frustrating from the area as the appears to be significant swelling to the finger as well as overlying granulation tissue at the tip of the finger. This will take a long time to heal and I would recommend soaking the finger in warm soapy water several times a day to soften the skin in the area.
responses.content_zh: 不清楚造成这种损伤的原因。手指和指尖的肉芽组织似乎明显胀大；如果该部位令你觉得不顺畅，我建议你亲自去看医生进行切口和引流。这伤口需要很长时间才能愈合，我建议每天用温肥皂水浸泡手指几次，以软化该部位的皮肤。

query_title_en: Will my hand have a scar?
query_title_zh: 我手这样会留疤吗
query_content_en: It was from scratching
query_content_zh: 挠出这样的

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if it will leave a scar. Use sunscreen or wear a hat when outdoors to minimize sun exposure to the area.
responses.content_zh: 很难确定是否会留下疤痕。为了减少该区域的日晒，请使用防晒霜或外出时戴帽子。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully evaluate wound as it is unclear where this is located however does have the appearance of a wound on the flexor surface.  There appears to be granulation tissue present with significant scaling.  In regards to the clinical question of will this have a scar, this will likely have some residual scar given the wound type.  To minimize scar formation, would recommend coverage with a topical antibiotic, nonadherent dressing and do dressing changes daily.  While doing dressing changes, may clean the wound gently with warm soapy water.  To minimize scar formation as the wound heals, avoid UV exposure and after there is no longer any evidence of open skin, may use scar minimization cream such as Mederma.
responses.content_zh: 由于不清楚伤口的具体部位，因此难以全面评估，但伤口似乎位于屈侧表面，有肉芽组织和显著鳞屑。针对是否会留下瘢痕的问题，基于伤口类型，可能会有一些残留瘢痕。为减少瘢痕形成，建议使用局部抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料进行覆盖，并每天更换敷料。在更换敷料时，可用温肥皂水轻柔清洗伤口。随着伤口愈合，为减少瘢痕形成，应避免紫外线照射，并在没有开放性伤口后，使用如Mederma的瘢痕淡化霜。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing appropriately, there is a possibility that there will be no scar.  I would recommend soaking your hand in warm soapy water to promote drainage from the wound and dressing the area with a nonadhesive dressing. I would recommend avoiding sunlight exposure to the hand and applying SPF as needed.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合，有可能不留疤痕。我建议将手浸泡在温肥皂水中，以促进伤口的引流，并用非粘附性包扎敷料包扎该区域。我建议避免手部暴露在阳光下，并根据需要涂抹防晒霜。

query_title_en: Fell off my bike, and the hospital recommended a skin graft, but I decided to recover at home.
query_title_zh: 骑车摔伤，医院要求植皮，回家保守恢复。
query_content_en: It's been 13 days now, and I feel anxious and awful while changing the dressing. I hope to get some support from this online forum. Hospital treatment for a skin graft costs over RMB ten thousand. I'm feeling bad to think that a single fall costs this much.
query_content_zh: 现在已经13天了，换药的时候紧张心里难受。希望能得到吧友得支持。去医院植皮治疗要1万出头呢，唉一跤打一万。谁不疼。

responses.content_en: A skin graft would allow for quicker healing, restore function and improve the appearance of the area but would not be mandatory. But the choice is ultimately up to you if the procedure is very costly.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤移植可以加速愈合，恢复功能并改善该区域的外观，但并非必需。最终的选择取决于您自己，特别是如果该手术费用较高的情况下。

responses.content_en: Significant tissue avulsion to the dorsal aspect of the foot with some exposed subcutaneous fat.  Will likely have extended healing.  With granulation tissue.  You should keep the wound clean and do gentle washing with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine to open skin.  You should use topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressings, change daily.  No overt evidence of secondary infection.
responses.content_zh: 足背部组织有显著撕脱，伴有部分皮下脂肪暴露，预计愈合时间较长，并伴有肉芽组织。你应保持伤口清洁，每天1至3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗。避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。建议使用抗生素软膏和无粘连敷料，并每日更换。无明显继发感染的证据。

responses.content_en: I'm sorry that this injury happened, and it is unfortunate that the skin graft treatment cost so much. It is possible that this area would not completely heal without a skin graft, and at the very least it would likely leave a large scar/mark without a skin graft. I would recommend it these financial concerns with your provider to see if there are any other options for you. If you decide to manage this at home, I would recommend soaking the wound in warm soapy water and dressing the wound with bacitracin ointment and a xeroform dressing.
responses.content_zh: 很遗憾发生了这种损伤。更加不幸的是，植皮治疗花费了这么多钱。如果没有皮肤移植，这个区域可能不会完全愈合；至少在没有皮肤移植的情况下，它可能会留下很大的疤痕/痕迹。我会与你的护理人员探讨这些医疗上的使费问题，看看是否有其他选择。如果你决定在家里处理这个问题，我建议把伤口浸泡在温肥皂水中，用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM敷料包扎伤口。

query_title_en: What kind of wound is this?
query_title_zh: 这到底是什么伤口
query_content_en: A wound with a diameter of one centimeter has pus.
query_content_zh: 直径一厘米，伤口有脓

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say what type of wound this is without additional information such as the history on how this wound appeared.
responses.content_zh: 在没有更多信息（如伤口出现的背景）的情况下，很难判断这是哪种类型的伤口。

responses.content_en: Appears to be a pressure injury but unclear as to the location, duration, or context.  Difficult to tell if infected given limited picture.  Needs medical evaluation and wound care
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来像是压疮，但位置、持续时间或具体情况不明确。由于图片信息有限，很难判断是否存在感染。建议进行医疗评估和专业伤口护理。

responses.content_en: This appears to be an infected 1 cm size wound with purulent drainage. Just based on the image it is difficult to assess the underlying depth of the infection but there is definite damage to the overlying skin with surrounding erythema (redness of the skin). This definitely needs in person evaluation by a physician and warrants potential drainage/antibiotics as well as further history as to what caused this wound.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是一个已受感染的1厘米大小的伤口，有流脓现象。仅根据图像很难评估感染的深度，但周围的红斑（皮肤发红）显示了上覆皮肤已受了损伤。你需要亲自去见医生进行评估；可能需要引流/服用抗生素，以及进一步了解的病史，以确定造成这种伤口的原因。

query_title_en: Cut off half with a kitchen knife.
query_title_zh: 菜刀切掉一半
query_content_en: Guys, what should I do? I accidentally cut myself the night before last. I used a band-aid at first, then changed it yesterday morning. The band-aid stuck to the wound, and when I took it off, it bled a little, so I applied some Yunnan Baiyao powder and put on another band-aid. I just removed it today, but it’s still sticking to the wound. It bled a little when I took it off. I disinfected it with iodine and put on another band-aid. How long will this take to heal?
query_content_zh: 兄弟们，这个怎么办 前天晚上不小心切到了 当时贴了个创口贴 昨天早上把创口贴换了 创口贴粘在伤口上面 取下来之后有点流血就在创可贴上面撒了点云南白药粉贴了上去 今天刚刚取下来了 还是粘在伤口上面 取下来有一点点溢血 用碘伏棉签消毒后又贴了个创可贴 这个大概什么时候能好呢

responses.content_en: Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. It may take up to 6-8 weeks for healing. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。愈合可能需要6至8周。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Do not use iodine, alcohol, or hydrogen peroxide.  Does not appear to be secondarily infected but would recommend cleaning wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing dressing.  Will need to heal by secondary intention and tissue will granulate in.  Nail will need to regrow.
responses.content_zh: 避免使用碘、酒精或过氧化氢。伤口似乎没有继发性感染，但建议每天用温肥皂水清洗三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。需要通过自发愈合方式进行修复，组织将逐渐长出肉芽。指甲需要重新长出。

responses.content_en: It appears as though a layer of your skin was removed when you removed the bandaid. I would recommend placing  bacitracin ointment to the wound and xeroform gauze to the wound to help with wound healing and prevent infection. This will likely take a few weeks to heal.
responses.content_zh: 当你除去伤口的包扎物时，你的皮肤似乎被除去了一层。我建议在伤口上涂抹杆菌肽软膏，敷上XEROFORM纱布，以帮助伤口愈合并预防感染。这可能需要几周的时间才能痊愈。

query_title_en: Will my finger heal back to its original look after this injury?
query_title_zh: 手指伤成这样还能恢复成原来的样子吗？
query_content_en: I injured myself while riding my bike. It's been almost three weeks. Will the two sides of skin grow together? Will it leave a scar? I didn't get stitches at the time. Would it have been better if I had?
query_content_zh: 骑车摔伤，快3周了，两边能长一起吗？会不会留一个坑？当时没缝针，缝起来会不会好一点

responses.content_en: There appears to be healing occuring but it is difficult to say if the two sides of the wound will come together and return to its original look. The wound may leave a scar. It may have helped to get stitches at that time as they would have brought the tissue together.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正在愈合，但目前很难确定伤口的两侧是否会完全愈合并恢复到原来的样子。伤口可能会留下疤痕。如果当时进行了缝合，可能有助于将组织拉拢在一起。

responses.content_en: Difficult to tell if there is a developing felon, fingerpad infection.  If there is swelling, pain, and redness, would need evaluation for possible incision and drainage.  Laceration appears to be healing but will need time to granulate in an heal.   Would recommend cleaning wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing dressing.  Tetanus should be updated if not up to date.
responses.content_zh: 很难判断是否有指腹感染或甲沟炎形成。如果有肿胀、疼痛和发红的情况，需要进行评估，可能需要切开和引流。撕裂伤正在愈合，但需要时间长出肉芽和完全恢复。建议每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。

responses.content_en: It is unclear based on the image if there is an underlying infection however the laceration appears to have come together appropriately. This may have benefited from sutures at the time to help wound healing however this wound has come together. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine whether there is an underlying infection in the finger.
responses.content_zh: 根据图像，尚不清楚是否有表面下的感染，但撕裂伤囗似乎已经正常地愈合。现在伤囗己愈合，在伤口愈合前，缝线复合对你可能有所帮助。我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定手指是否有受到感染。

query_title_en: Does this require a tetanus shot?
query_title_zh: 这种要打破伤风吗
query_content_en: Will it scar?
query_content_zh: 会不会留疤啊

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you get a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the last 5 years. There is a possibility that it may leave a scar. If it continues to bleed, you may need to go to the nearest Urgent Care for stitches. Otherwise, perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage. Consult a doctor if you have fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness, bleeding or pus-like discharge.
responses.content_zh: 如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种。伤口可能会留下疤痕。如果出血持续，您可能需要前往最近的急诊护理中心进行缝合。或是继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。如果出现发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红、出血或脓样分泌物，请咨询医生。

responses.content_en: Healing laceration. If tetanus is not up to date would recommend tetanus.  Clean would three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing.
responses.content_zh: 撕裂伤正在愈合。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。

responses.content_en: I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine the depth of the laceration and if you need sutures. If you had your tetanus shot recently (last 10 years) then you do not need another vaccine. This will likely leave a scar long term but to help reduce the chance of scarring I would keep the laceration away from sunlight and keep the area clean.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定撕裂损伤的深度，以及是否需要缝合。如果你最近（过去10年）接种了破伤风疫苗，那么你就不需要再接种疫苗了。这可能会长期留下疤痕。为了减少疤痕的机会，我会让撕裂处远离阳光，保持该部位清洁。

query_title_en: Went out shirtless for a walk and got injured by some mischievous kids. How do I treat this to avoid scarring?
query_title_zh: 光着膀子出去遛弯被熊孩子暗杀了，想问问这种伤怎么处理不留疤
query_content_en: Went out shirtless for a walk and got injured by some mischievous kids. How do I treat this to avoid scarring?
query_content_zh: 光着膀子出去遛弯被熊孩子暗杀了，想问问这种伤怎么处理不留疤

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as you may need treatment with stitches. I would recommend a tetanus vaccine if you have not had one in the last 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心接受进一步检查，您可能需要缝合治疗。如果您在过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，我建议您接种破伤风疫苗。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully appreciate size of the wound however there does appear to be significant tissue gapping which would heal better with sutures.  If wound is greater than 24 hours old, would not recommend suture repair given increased risk for infection.  In order to minimize any scarring during and after the wound heals, avoid UV exposure, use sunscreen for up to 1 year, avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  Use emollients including moisturizing lotions and topical antibiotic ointment and keep the wound clean and covered with a nonadherent dressing.  After the wound heals to minimize scar formation you may do tissue massage to align collagen fibers and use scar cream such as Mederma
responses.content_zh: 伤口的大小不易明确，但似乎有明显的组织缺损，缝合可能有助于愈合。如果伤口超过24小时，不建议缝合，以免增加感染风险。为减少愈合期间和愈合后的瘢痕形成，避免紫外线照射，使用防晒霜持续一年，避免使用酒精、双氧水或碘等干燥剂。可使用润肤剂如保湿乳液和局部抗生素软膏，保持伤口清洁并用无粘连敷料覆盖。在伤口愈合后，为减少瘢痕，可进行组织按摩以整合胶原纤维，并使用如Mederma的瘢痕霜。

responses.content_en: Difficult to assess based on this image, it does not appear to be a deep laceration however if you have concerned that the wound is not closing then I would recommend presenting to the hospital to be evaluated further.
responses.content_zh: 根据这张照片很难评估，它似乎不是深度的撕裂损伤；但是，如果你担心伤口不能愈合，我建议你去医院做进一步评估。

query_title_en: How should I treat this kind of scar?
query_title_zh: 想问下这种伤疤怎么处理
query_content_en: How should I treat this scar? You can see the blood vessels, and it's a bit itchy. Does it need treatment, or is it hopeless?
query_content_zh: 想问一下这种伤疤怎么处理，可以看到血管，还有点痒，需要处理吗还是肯定好不了了

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you see a Dermatology or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您去看皮肤科或整形外科专家，讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: Need more information as to the mechanism of injury if this was a burn versus laceration.  Appears to be healing although picture quality is poor and difficult to fully visualize the wound.  If there is scarring present, to minimize long-term appearance of scar would recommend  avoiding UV exposure, using sunscreen at all times, keeping the wound moisturized with emollients.  If scar permission is present, you may perform massage of the tissue to realign collagen fibers and use topical scar medication such as Mederma.  Given the size of the injury, there will likely still be some residual scar and if you require cosmetic effects will likely need scar revision surgery.
responses.content_zh: 需要更多关于损伤机制的信息，以判断是烧伤还是撕裂伤。虽然图片质量较差，难以完全看清伤口，但似乎正在愈合。如果有疤痕，为了减轻疤痕的明显程度，建议避免暴露於紫外线，持续使用防晒霜，并用润肤剂保持伤口湿润。如果出现疤痕增生，可按摩组织以帮助胶原纤维重新排列，并使用疤痕药物（如Mederma）。由于损伤面积较大，可能会遗留一些疤痕，如需改善外观，可能需要疤痕修复手术。

responses.content_en: I would recommend dressing the area with a bacitracin ointment and a xeroform dressing as it is starting to heal. It may scar, I would recommend reducing sunlight exposure to the area to reduce the likelihood of this.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经开始愈合，我建议用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM包扎物料包扎该部位。它可能会留下疤痕，我建议减少该位置的阳光照射，以降低这种可能性。

query_title_en: My ring finger got cut by a stainless steel edge.
query_title_zh: 无名指被白钢边划伤
query_content_en: My finger was cut by a stainless steel edge a few days ago. Does it have pus inside? It doesn’t seem like it when I press it. I just disinfected it. Any advice on how to treat this?
query_content_zh: 手指被白钢边划伤好几天了，这样里面是有脓液吗？按着好像还没有的样子，刚消消毒，有懂得还怎么处理

responses.content_en: Pus is usually thick and appears yellow/white/green.
