If you are concerned about an infection or have other symptoms such as fever, chills, warmth, swelling, pain, redness or bleeding, consult a doctor and have this evaluated in-person. A tetanus vaccine is also recommended if you have not received it in the past 5 years. Otherwise, perform wound care with washing the area with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 脓液通常较为浓稠，颜色呈黄色、白色或绿色。如果您担心感染或出现其他症状，如发烧、寒战、发热、肿胀、疼痛、发红或出血，请咨询医生并进行面对面的检查。如果您在过去5年内没有接种过破伤风疫苗，建议接种。否则，继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Laceration appears to be greater than 24 hours old and not amenable for suture repair.  There appears to be some granulation tissue with mild erythema of the skin flap.  No overt signs of infection.  Would recommend local wound care including soaking in warm soapy water 1-3 times a day for 10 to 15 minutes at a time.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydroperoxide, or iodine.  You may apply topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 撕裂伤似乎已超过24小时，不适合缝合修复。伤口有一些肉芽组织，伴有轻度红斑，但无明显感染迹象。建议局部伤口护理，包括每天浸泡温肥皂水1到3次，每次10至15分钟。避免使用干燥物质，如酒精、过氧化氢或碘。可使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say based on the image whether there is pus inside however it simply looks inflamed in the area. I would recommend soaking the area and warm soapy water to soften the skin and promote drainage if it is infected. I would recommend keeping the area covered with a non-adherent dressing to prevent further damage to the area.
responses.content_zh: 根据图像很难说里面是否有脓液，但它看起来已是发炎了。如果已受感染，我建议浸泡该区域、并用温肥皂水软化皮肤、和导走多馀液体。我建议用非粘附性包扎料覆盖该部位，以防止对它造成进一步损害。。

query_title_en: Seeking help from community members, surgeons, emergency responders, and doctors.
query_title_zh: 求助吧友外科#急救#大夫#伤口#
query_content_en: An elderly was injured by firecrackers during the New Year. The leg wound area is purple. Is this bruising or an infection?
query_content_zh: 家里老人过年被鞭炮炸伤 腿部伤口面积发紫 如图 请问这是有淤血还是要感染#伤# #大夫# 【图片】【图片】【图片】

responses.content_en: The top portion of the wound may be an infection as it appears to have some yellow drainage. I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 伤口上半部可能有感染迹象，因为似乎有一些黄色渗液。我建议您前往最近的急诊护理中心接受进一步评估。

responses.content_en: Appears to be a burn injury.  Your needs tetanus updated if not up to date.  Does not appear to be secondarily infected but would recommend cleaning wound three times a day with warm soapy water and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是烧伤。如果破伤风疫苗未补接种，建议补接种。看起来没有继发感染，但建议每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口三次，并使用抗生素软膏和非粘附性敷料包扎。

responses.content_en: Based on the image it is hard to say whether this is a infection or a bruise, or a component of both. This warrants further evaluation by a doctor in person to determine whether there is underlying injury/infection.
responses.content_zh: 根据图像，很难说这是感染还是瘀伤，或者两者兼而有之。这需要医生亲自进行进一步评估，以确定是否有表面下的损伤/感染。

query_title_en: The tendon on the bodyside of my forearm is completely rutpured!
query_title_zh: 小臂胳膊内测肌腱全断了！
query_content_en: Can any experts advise me on how to treat this persistent infection? I'm allergic to many antibiotics, including penicillin, ciprofloxacin, and levofloxacin. What should I do? I'm currently at the city hospital, but the condition is still not under control. If anyone has experience with this, please help. Otherwise, I might lose my arm.
query_content_zh: 各位大佬给看看这个怎么治呀感染了，不见好怎么办呀急急，医院里很多抗生素过敏，青霉素环丙沙星，左氧氟沙星，都过敏，怎么办呀，现在人在市医院，病情还没有控制住，各位谁有经验，给想想办法，在不行胳膊保不住了

responses.content_en: I would recommend that you ask to speak to an Infectious Disease specialist to discuss treatment options.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您请求与传染病专家讨论治疗方案。

responses.content_en: Pictures appear to be from a surgical operation.  Unable to give recommendation and would recommend discussion with a medical team.  Regarding the your question as to how to treat an infection, this should be discussed with the a surgical team and infectious disease.
responses.content_zh: 这些图片似乎来自外科手术，无法给出具体建议。建议与医疗团队讨论。至于如何治疗感染的问题，应与外科团队和感染科沟通。

responses.content_en: I would recommend discussing this with the providers in the hospital. You may benefit from antibiotics from this but there are several options for antibiotics that are not the ones that you are allergic to.
responses.content_zh: 我建议你与医院里的医务人员讨论这个问题。服用抗生素可能对你有所帮助；如对一些抗生素有过敏现象，你可以服用其他抗生素。

query_title_en: I got hit by a car on a cement road and my arm has several wounds with some flesh scraped off. How long will it take to heal? I need to continue basketball training. The wounds are shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 在水泥地被车撞手臂上好几处伤擦掉了几块肉这样的伤要多久会好还要篮球训练，伤口如图

responses.content_en: The wounds do not appear infected. Given the type of trauma, I recommend emergency room evaluation for imaging.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看起来没有感染。鉴于创伤的类型，我建议去急诊室做影像检查。

responses.content_en: Very difficult to appreciate the wound from the pictures but appears to be multiple areas including elbow, heel/foot.  Appears to be healing well with granulation tissue without secondary signs of infection.  Would recommend continued local wound care.  Avoid any drying agents such as there is alcohol, hydrogen peroxide, or iodine.  Will still likely require multiple weeks of wound care for healing.  You may use topical antibiotic ointment and use nonadherent dressing.  May clean the wound 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water.
responses.content_zh: 很难从图片中看清伤口，但似乎包括肘部和脚后跟/脚多个部位。愈合良好，具有肉芽组织，没有二次感染的迹象。建议继续进行局部伤口护理。避免使用任何干燥剂，如酒精、过氧化氢或碘。愈合可能仍然需要数周的伤口护理。你可以使用局部抗生素软膏，并使用不粘贴敷料。可以每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口1到3次。

responses.content_en: This appears to be road rash, or superficial abrasions from the accident. As long as you have no other internal injuries, this should heal in a few weeks and shouldn't prevent you from doing basketball training.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是路疹，或事故造成的表面擦伤。只要内部没有受伤，几星期内会愈合，不会诊影响你你篮球训练。

query_content_en: I had surgery on my leg ten years ago, and after the stitches were removed, it seemed like the wound opened up again. After healing, the part that opened up became the scar shown in the picture. It has no sensation, feels hard with no elasticity, and the skin tends to crack easily. Is this normal? How should I take care of it daily?
query_content_zh: 十年前腿部做的手术，拆线后好像伤口裂开了，痊愈后裂开那部分就是如图的疤痕，而且没啥知觉，发硬没弹性，皮肤容易崩裂，请问这正常吗？日常应如何保养呢？

responses.content_en: Scar massage can be attempted to soften scars. The scar tissue has decreased elastiscity and strength compared to normal tissue. You can continue applying moisturizer daily.
responses.content_zh: 可以尝试进行疤痕按摩以软化疤痕。疤痕组织的弹性和强度比正常组织低。您可以每天继续涂抹保湿霜。

responses.content_en: Hypertrophic surgical scar.  Can try tissue massage and scar cream but given the size would likely need scar revision surgery if you want cosmetic improvement of the wound.
responses.content_zh: 增生性手术瘢痕。可以尝试组织按摩和瘢痕膏，但考虑到其大小，如果你希望改善伤口外观，可能需要进行瘢痕修复手术。

responses.content_en: This appears to be a thick raised scar, also known as a hypertrophic scar. I would continue to keep the wound clean, and prevent opening up the scar with movement as it may take additional time to heal.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是一个厚厚的凸起疤痕，也称为增生性疤痕。继续保持伤口清洁，并防止因活动而弄开疤痕，因为如此一来，这可能需要额外的时间才能愈合。

query_title_en: What should I do about a scar on my face? It's urgent!!!
query_title_zh: 脸上伤口留疤怎么办？急！！！
query_content_en: As shown in the picture, has the wound completely healed now? If so, can I wash my face with water and apply ointment? Which ointment is the best? Please provide an answer!!!! Thank you for the detailed response, I prefer not to have copy-paste answers.
query_content_zh: 如图所示，现在是伤口完全愈合了吗？如果是，可以用水洗脸和涂药膏了吗？哪种药膏最好？求解答！！！！谢谢解答，越详细越好，不喜欢复制粘贴。

responses.content_en: The wound is healed and you can wash your face with water. You can apply any ointment such as Vaseline.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经愈合，您可以用水洗脸。可以涂抹凡士林等软膏。

responses.content_en: Avoid UV exposure, use SPF containing moisturizer, massage area three times a day and use Mederma scar cream.
responses.content_zh: 避免紫外线暴露，使用含防晒成分的保湿剂，每天按摩该区域三次，使用Mederma瘢痕膏。

responses.content_en: Based on the image provided, it is hard to determine whether the wound is healed or not. At this time I do not recommend any ointments or urgent action to address the scar,
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像，很难确定伤口是否愈合。我不建议使用任何药膏；现时亦没有任何迫切需要来治理疤痕。

query_title_en: For minor dog bites or scratches, does the wound shape look like this in the picture? As shown in the picture.
query_title_zh: 被狗咬伤或抓伤轻微伤口形状图是不是这个样子的啊如图所是

responses.content_en: A scratch can look like the injury as in the photo.
responses.content_zh: 划痕可能看起来像照片中的伤口。

responses.content_en: If vaccination status of dog is unknown, would recommend rabies series.  Local wound care is sufficient.
responses.content_zh: 如果狗的疫苗接种状态未知，建议接种狂犬病疫苗。局部伤口护理就行了。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided, this could potentially be caused by a minor dog bite. I would keep the area clean and dry and dress with a non-adherent dressing. ￼
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像，很难确定情况。伤口可能是由轻微的狗咬伤引起的。我会保持伤口清洁干燥，并用非粘附性的包扎物包好。

query_title_en: My toenail just fell off. Will it grow back? (as shown in the picture)
query_title_zh: 趾甲刚脱落，如图这样还会不会长？
query_content_en: A month ago, I got hit, and now the scab has just fallen off. Can I use hydrogen peroxide to clean it? Or should I use a band-aid?
query_content_zh: 一个月前被砸了，现在才脱落。这样可不可以用双氧水洗？或者能不能用邦迪啊？

responses.content_en: It can take up to 6 weeks for the nail to regrow. Continue wound care with washing the area with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 指甲可能需要长达6周才能重新生长。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Avoid hydrogen peroxide.  Keep clean and covered with dry dressing
responses.content_zh: 避免使用过氧化氢。保持清洁，用干燥的敷料覆盖。

responses.content_en: I would avoid hydrogen peroxide as this would increase inflammation,  however do keep the area clean and dry. I would recommend being seen by a physician to determine whether there is an underlying infection given the area of redness around nail bed and to determine whether you will need a course of antibiotics.
responses.content_zh: 因为会增加发炎的情况，避免使用二氧化氢，但一定要保持该部位清洁干燥。我建议你去看医生，以确定指甲床周围发红的区域是否由於己受感染，并确定你是否需要服用抗生素。

query_title_en: After being burned by boiling water and self treated, the skin fell off few days later and the wound site had some blackish yellow gangrenous tissue. Image attached. Is this concerning? What should I do next?
query_title_zh: 开水烧伤自行处理几天后皮掉了伤口部有偏黑色和黄色的腐肉 如图，要紧不？接下来如何处理？
query_content_en: It was burned at night. I wrapped it the first day, and then the next day, there was blisters. I applied the burn cream again. Two days later, there was drainage coming out from the blister. I wrapped it after rinsing it with sodium chloride, and a day later, the blister ruptured, showing yellow gangrenous tissue. With no choice, I removed the grangrenous skin, rinsed it with sodium chloride, then applied burn cream and wrapped it. It then became what it looks like right now, and there is redness at the periwound area. What should I do? Is this serious?
query_content_zh: 由于是晚上烫伤，第一天简单包扎后第二天，起了水泡，再次简单用烧伤膏处理两天后，水泡流出液体，无奈，氯化钠清洗后包扎，一天后，水泡皮破掉，此时出现黄色腐肉。无奈 又将腐肉皮去掉后氯化钠溶液清洗后再次用烧伤膏包扎，于是成了今天这个样子，周围发红，该如何处理，要紧不？

responses.content_en: The wound is not infected and is healing. Continue to clean with soap and water and cover with a dry dressing. The redness around the wound is exposed skin from where the blister came off.
responses.content_zh: 伤口没有感染，正在愈合。继续用肥皂和水清洗，并用干燥敷料覆盖。伤口周围的红肿是水泡脱落后暴露的皮肤。

responses.content_en: The yellow tissue is healing granulation tissue.  No signs of infection. The granulation tissue will expand out to the wound edge. May do gentle washing with soap and water, avoid excessive scrubbing, and apply topical antibiotic with nonadherent dressing
responses.content_zh: 黄色组织是愈合的肉芽组织。没有感染的迹象。肉芽组织将扩展到伤口边缘。可以进行温和的肥皂水清洗，避免过度摩擦，并涂抹局部抗生素和不粘贴敷料。

responses.content_en: This area appears to be healing appropriately. I would apply zero form and bacitracin to the area to prevent infection and promote healing. It does not appear to be infected at this time.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合中。需要在这个部位涂上杆菌肽软膏、和用XEROFORM包扎料包好，以助长愈合。目前似乎没有受到感染。

query_title_en: Bumped my head just now, as shown in the picture. Will it scar? Will hair not grow in that spot in the future? Thank you!
query_title_zh: 头上碰了下，如图，请问会结疤吗？以后伤口位置会不会不长头发？谢谢…

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if it will scar and if the hair will grow back as it depends on how the body heals.
responses.content_zh: 是否会留下疤痕以及头发是否会重新生长难以确定，这取决于身体的愈合情况。

responses.content_en: Difficult to fully evaluate the wound in the attached picture however there does appear to be a laceration.  There likely will be some scarring which may impact some hair growth although given the apparent size of the injury impact will likely be minimal. Would recommend continued wound care including cleaning the wound gently 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 在附加的图片中很难完全评估伤口，但似乎有一个裂口。可能会出现一些瘢痕，可能影响一些毛发生长，尽管考虑到伤口的尺寸，影响可能会非常小。建议继续伤口护理，包括每天1到3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗伤口。如果破伤风接种过期，应更新。

responses.content_en: The area may scar slightly, however once the wound heals hair will continue to grow in that area in the future. I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine if your tetanus is not up-to-date. Keep the area clean and dry as it continues to heal. If the wound is deep, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person for a few sutures as the scalp tends to bleed more than other areas.
responses.content_zh: 该部位可能会有轻微的疤痕形成。但一旦伤口愈合，以后毛发将可以在那部位继续生长。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。在愈合的过程中，保持该区域清洁干燥。因为头皮比其他部位更容易出血，如果伤口很深，我建议你亲自去看医生缝合几针。

query_title_en: How should I treat a cut two days after the injury? As shown in the picture, it seems to have some pus.
query_title_zh: 请问割伤2天后的伤口怎么处理，如图，好像有点浓

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily. Cover with a dry bandage. It may take 2-4 weeks to heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并用干燥的绷带覆盖。伤口可能需要2-4周才能愈合。

responses.content_en: Wound does not appear to be secondarily infected.  Drainage appears to be serous in nature.  If the cut is over 2 days old, would not recommend suture repair.  It appears to be on an elbow which will likely have delayed healing given range of motion.  Would recommend topical antibiotic ointment, nonadherent dressing with dressing changes daily.  May clean the wound 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有二次感染。排出的液体呈浆液性。如果切口超过2天，则不建议缝合修复。伤口似乎在肘部，延迟愈合可能是活动范围造成的。建议涂抹局部抗生素软膏，使用不粘贴敷料，每天更换敷料。可以每天用温肥皂水清洗伤口1到3次。如果破伤风接种过期，则应更新。

responses.content_en: I would recommend washing the area with warm soapy water and not vigorously cleaning the area. I would avoid any strong cleaners like alcohol or hydrogen peroxide to keep the area clean. I would recommend soaking the area in warm soapy water several times a day and dressing the wound with xeroform dressing and bacitracin ointment.
responses.content_zh: 我建议用温肥皂水清洗该部位，不要用力清洗。我会避免使用酒精或二氧化氢等强效清洁剂来清洁伤口部位。我建议每天将该部位浸泡在温肥皂水中数次，并用XEROFORM和杆菌肽软膏包扎伤口。

query_content_en: Scratched by a cat, as shown in the picture. Should I go to the hospital for this? This situation shouldn't be too troublesome, right?
query_content_zh: 被猫抓了一道痕，如图，这种情况需不需要就医如图，需不需要就医这种情况应该不会太麻烦吧？

responses.content_en: This is a superficial wound. No need for hospital evaluation or rabies shot. Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 这是表浅伤口，无需去医院检查或注射狂犬疫苗。每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用干燥的绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Need to ensure rabies status of cat.  If cat is not vaccinated and can be observed for any behavioral changes, you likely do not need rabies series.  If vaccination status is unknown of the cat and the cat cannot be observed then would recommend discussing with medical provider as to utility of rabies vaccination series.  You should update tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Otherwise local wound care with simple topical antibiotic ointment is appropriate.
responses.content_zh: 需要确认猫的狂犬病状态。如果猫没有接种疫苗并且可以观察其行为变化，你可能不需要狂犬病疫苗。如果猫的疫苗接种状态未知且无法观察，则建议与医生讨论狂犬病疫苗系列的必要性。如果破伤风接种过期，你应更新。否则，可以进行局部伤口护理，简单地使用局部抗生素软膏是适当的。

responses.content_en: If the wound continues to heal appropriately, you may not need to be seen by a physician in person for this, as long as you know that the cat is up-to-date on its rabies vaccine and/or the cat does not show any signs of rabies. If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 如果伤口继续愈合，和你知道猫接种了有效的狂犬症疫苗、或猫没有出现任何狂犬症迹象，你可能不需要亲自去看医生。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: I was scratched by a cat, causing a bit of bleeding, as shown in the picture. Is it serious? Do I need to get a shot?
query_title_zh: 被猫抓到有点血流出，如图，要不要紧？要不要去打针？

responses.content_en: I recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care to receive a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since your last one. Continue woud care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，我建议您前往最近的急诊中心接种破伤风疫苗。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be secondarily infected.  If cat is known to the you and can be observed for any behavioral changes or vaccination status is known, unlikely to need rabies series.  If vaccination status is unknown or cannot be observed, would recommend discussion with medical provider as to utility of rabies series.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 似乎没有二次感染。如果猫是你认识的并且可以观察行为变化，或确认疫苗接种状态，则不太可能需要狂犬病疫苗。如果疫苗接种状态未知或无法观察，建议与医生讨论狂犬病疫苗系列的必要性。如果破伤风接种过期，应该更新。

responses.content_en: I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccination if your tetanus is not up-to-date. Otherwise I would keep the area clean and dry. If it is continuing to bleed I would apply a dressing to it to prevent any interference with the healing.
responses.content_zh: 如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。否则，我会保持该部位清洁干燥。若它继续流血，我会敷上包扎物，以防止对愈合造成任何干扰。

query_title_en: I don't know what bit me, but there are two bumps.
query_title_zh: 不知道被什么咬了，伤口是两个连在一起包
query_content_en: Last night, while sleeping at home, I was bitten by something (I live in Chongqing, China, so it's not something like a black widow). There are two bumps, close together, about 0.5 cm apart. They are swollen larger than a mosquito bite and are oozing a clear liquid that seems like saline. I have three such wounds, and I'm not sure what bit me. My friends say it might be a spider bite. What could have bitten me, and how should I treat it? The wounds are shown in the picture.
query_content_zh: 我晚上在家睡觉不知道被什么咬了，（我家住中国重庆，不要整些什么黑寡妇），有两个包，而且是挨着的，中间有0.5厘米的间隔，肿得比蚊子咬的大些，而且还流些貌似是生理盐水的液体。我这样的伤口有3个，不知道是什么咬的，还咬得这么艺术，两个包。。。朋友说是蜘蛛咬的。。请问是什么咬的啊？该怎么处理呢？伤口如图

responses.content_en: It is difficult to determine what type of insect caused this. If the bites are itching you can take an antihistamine medication. Otherwise clean with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 很难确定是哪种昆虫引起的。如果被咬的地方很痒，您可以服用抗组胺药物。否则，用肥皂和水清洗伤口，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be infected at this time.  Would recommend warm soapy soaks three times a day and topical antibiotic with clean dry dressing.  If there is concern for bat or mammal bite would recommend rabies prophylaxis
responses.content_zh: 目前似乎没有感染。建议每天三次热肥皂水浸泡，并使用局部抗生素加干燥的敷料。如果担心是蝙蝠或哺乳动物咬伤，建议接种狂犬病预防。

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear to be infected at this time, I would keep the area dry and clean with a non-adherent dressing. Depending on what you were bitten by, you may need rabies vaccine, depends on the area. ￼
responses.content_zh: 覌时伤口似乎没有感染，我会用非粘附性的包扎物包好、并保持该部位干燥清洁。具体情况取决于你被什么动物咬了、和被咬地区，你可能需要注射狂犬症疫苗，

query_title_en: I scraped from riding the bike, as shown in the picture. Is the wound infected? How should I treat it?
query_title_zh: 骑自行车擦伤了，具体如图所示。伤口有没有发炎呢？应该如何处理比较好
query_content_en: There are some medications at home: Yunnan Baiyao powder, alcohol, iodine tincture, merbromin, hydrogen peroxide, cefradine capsules
query_content_zh: 家里有些药：云南白药粉，酒精，碘酒，红汞，双氧水，头孢拉定胶囊

responses.content_en: The wound is not infected and is healing. Continue to clean with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a dry dressing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口没有感染，正在愈合。继续用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用干燥敷料覆盖。

responses.content_en: Gently clean with warm soapy water three times a day.  Avoid iodine or hydrogen peroxide to open skin. Use topical antibiotic ointment and non-adherent dressing.  Update tetanus if not up to date
responses.content_zh: 每天用温肥皂水轻柔清洁三次。避免在口子上使用碘或过氧化氢。使用局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴敷料。如果破伤风接种过期，应更新疫苗。

responses.content_en: The wound does not appear to be infected at this time, I would recommend washing it with warm soapy soaks and keeping the area clean. I would dress it with a xeroform dressing and apply bacitracin ointment.
responses.content_zh: 覌时伤口似乎没有感染， 我建议用温肥皂水清洗和保持该部位清洁。我会使用杆菌肽软膏和XEROFORM包扎好。

query_content_en: I previously got burned by a motorcycle exhaust pipe. The treatment went well, and there were no other issues. Today, the wound feels numb and itchy, which seems like a sign of healing (as shown in Picture 1). However, after swimming for about 5 minutes, the wound split open again (as shown in Picture 2). I have applied an Iodophor-like medication. How should I handle this? Is it serious? I need urgent advice as I am traveling in Vietnam and it's not very convenient here.
query_content_zh: 之前被摩托车排气管烫伤 处理得还可以 没有别的啥 今天伤口麻痒 感觉要好了（如图一）。  后被诱惑游泳5min左右 伤口崩裂…如图二 已涂类似碘伏的药物。请问后续如何处理 ？？？会不会严重！！！ 在线等 急！！！（在越南旅游不太方便😭）

responses.content_en: Keep wound clean and dry with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage. There is a blister around the wound that may drain. If pus leaks out or redness spreads, seek evaluation.
responses.content_zh: 保持伤口清洁干燥，用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。伤口周围有水泡，可能会破裂。如果有脓液流出或红肿扩散，请及时就医。

responses.content_en: Avoid iodine to open skin.  Does not appear infected but would recommend topical antibiotic ointment and non-adherent dressing.  Avoid submerging the wound while healing.
responses.content_zh: 避免在口子上上使用碘。似乎没有感染，但建议使用局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴敷料。在愈合期间避免浸泡伤口。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing appropriately, make sure to apply bacitracin ointment with a zero form dressing to this area to promote when healing and prevent infection. It may continue to drain.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合中。需要在这个部位涂上杆菌肽软膏、和用XEROFORM包扎料包好，以助长愈合并预防感染。伤口可能继续有流液现象。

query_content_en: I was scratched by a rusted metal when wiping glass. As shown in the photo. Is this alright? Waiting online.
query_content_zh: 刚刚擦玻璃碰到了生锈的铁，被划伤了，如图有没有事啊？在线等如图

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage. Recommend tetanus shot if you have not had one in the past 5 years.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并涂抹抗生素软膏。用干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。如果您在过去5年内没有接种破伤风疫苗，建议接种。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be laceration that is amenable to suture repair.  Would recommend cleaning gently with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily, applying topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.  Would recommend updating tetanus shot if tetanus is not up-to-date
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎不是可以缝合修复的裂口。建议每天轻柔地用温肥皂水清洗1到3次，涂抹局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴的敷料。如果破伤风疫苗过期，建议更新。

responses.content_en: The wound itself appears to be fairly superficial, it will heal well. If your tetanus is not up-to-date,  I would strongly recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 伤口看来相当浅，会愈合得很好。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: My calf bone was injured on the side as showned in the image, how should I treat it? The bone likely is not fractured yet.
query_title_zh: 小腿骨一侧如图受伤，怎么处理？腿骨应该没骨折
query_content_en: The superficial later has some tissue scraped out, and the skin has seirous bruising. Currently, the leg is swollen.
query_content_zh: 浅层有少量肉被刮掉，皮肤挫伤严重，目前腿肿胀

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并涂抹抗生素软膏。用干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。

responses.content_en: Appears to be superficial wound with some violation of the dermis.  Does not appear to be secondarily infected.  Likely underlying hematoma.  Would recommend local wound care including updating tetanus shot if not updated, cleaning 1-3 times daily with warm soapy water, applying topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, hydrogen peroxide or iodine.
responses.content_zh: 似乎是表浅伤口伴随真皮层伤到了。似乎没有二次感染。可能有潜在的血肿。建议进行局部伤口护理，包括如果过期则更新破伤风疫苗，每天用温肥皂水清洗1到3次，涂抹局部抗生素软膏并使用不粘贴敷料。避免使用任何干燥剂，如酒精、过氧化氢或碘。

responses.content_en: This appears to be bruising from an injury to your calf, which does not specifically need treatment but warrants further evaluation for underlying injury (i.e. fracture). I would recommend you get an x-ray of the area to evaluate further given the swelling and bruising.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是小腿受伤造成的瘀伤，不需要特别治疗，但需要对潜在损伤（即骨折）进行进一步评估。因为伤口有肿胀和瘀伤，我建议你对受伤部位进行X光检查以进一步评估。

query_content_en: My index finger was injured a year ago, and there is a hard nodule at the wound healed site. It does not hurt. As shown on the imgae. I did laser afterward, and a year later, the nodule has grown back, and the size is the same. It always grow back whenever I tried to remvoe it. Can I ask what is it?
query_content_zh: 一年前食指受伤，伤口愈合后有个硬结，不痛。如图。后面做了激光，一年后硬结又长出来了，还是同样大小，割了又长割了又长。求问这是什么

responses.content_en: This may be excess skin or tissue at the site of injury.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是伤口部位的多余皮肤或组织。

responses.content_en: Appears to be dyshidrotic eczema or possible herpetic whitlow.  Would recommend viral testing for HSV.  If negative for viral infection would recommend keeping moisturized or using mild topical steroid ointment.
responses.content_zh: 似乎是掌部湿疹或可能是疱疹状趾炎。建议进行HSV的病毒检测。如果病毒感染结果为阴性，建议保持滋润或使用温和的局部类固醇软膏。

responses.content_en: Well, this may be a simple fluid collection that repeatedly returns, it's possible that this may be from the herpes virus, given that it keeps returning. I would recommend being a valuated by a physician in person for further treatment and management. ￼
responses.content_zh: 这可能是一个不停复发的液体沉积情况。考虑到它反复发生，这可能来自疱疹病毒。我建议你去看医生，让他亲自评估，以进行进一步的治理。

query_content_en: My wound scab got accidentally knocked off after it had healed. See picture.
query_content_zh: 我的伤口结痂之后被不小心碰掉了如图

responses.content_en: Perform wound care and clean with soap and water daily. The wound is not infected.
responses.content_zh: 每天进行伤口护理，用肥皂和水清洗。伤口没有感染。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be infected.  Will heal with local wound care.  Clean with warm soapy water three times a day and use topical antibiotic with non-adherent dressing
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎没有感染。局部伤口护理会愈合的。每日用温肥皂水清洗三次，并使用局部抗生素和不粘贴敷料。

responses.content_en: This appears to be a well-healing noninfected scab wound, in which the scab has come off. This will heal well, just make sure to keep the area clean and avoid removing the scabs in the future to allow for proper healing.
responses.content_zh: 似乎是一个末受感染、但已愈合得相当好的有痂伤口；其中的痂已脱落。只要确保伤口保持清诘、和以后避免把痂摘除以容许正常愈合、这会愈合得很好。

query_title_en: I was scratched by an iron screw. The wound is not deep and looks like this (as shown in the picture). The screw head is flat, and I don't know if it was rusty. Could I get tetanus?
query_title_zh: 被铁螺丝划伤了，不深，大概这样（如图），螺丝头是平的，不知道生锈没，会得破伤风吗？

responses.content_en: There is a possibility of getting tetanus. I would recommend that you get the vaccine if it has been over 5 years since your last one.
responses.content_zh: 有可能感染破伤风。如果您上次接种疫苗已经超过5年，我建议您接种破伤风疫苗。

responses.content_en: If tetanus is not up to date would recommend updating tetanus. Otherwise local wound care is sufficient.
responses.content_zh: 如果破伤风接种过期，建议更新破伤风疫苗。否则，局部伤口护理足够。

responses.content_en: If you have not received the tetanus vaccine in the last five years, I would recommend being seen by a physician to receive the tetanus vaccine. ￼
responses.content_zh: 如果你在过去五年里没有接种过破伤风疫苗，我建议你去看医生以接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: There's a white scab formed over the wound, what should I do?
query_title_zh: 伤口上面结了一层白色的痂，怎么办
query_content_en: As shown in the picture, I fell off my motorcycle the night before yesterday. I treated it briefly and yesterday afternoon went to the hospital where they prescribed medication to apply (growth factors), along with oral antibiotics. Now the wound looks like this, what‘s going on?
query_content_zh: 如图，前天晚上骑摩托车摔了，简单处理了下昨天下午去医院开了点药擦(生长因子)﻿，还有口服抗炎药，现在这个伤口就变成这样了，怎么回事

responses.content_en: The white crust around the edge of the wound may be the ointment applied at the hospital. The wound is healing appropriately. Clean with water and soap daily
responses.content_zh: 伤口边缘的白色硬痂可能是医院涂抹的药膏残留。伤口正在正常愈合。每天用肥皂和水清洗。

responses.content_en: Unclear as to what the topical medication was however white crusting may be secondary to the topical medication.  Would recommend continued use of topical antibiotic ointment with nonadherent dressing.  Wound does not appear to be secondarily infected as of now.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Recommend gentle cleaning with warm soapy water 1-3 times daily and changing nonadherent dressing daily.
responses.content_zh: 不清楚局部药物是什么，但白色结痂可能是由于局部药物引起的。建议继续使用局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴敷料。伤口似乎目前没有二次感染。如果破伤风疫苗接种过期，则应更新。建议每天用温肥皂水轻柔清洗1到3次，并每天更换不粘贴敷料。

responses.content_en: This appears to be granulation tissue and the scab appears to be forming at this time. If the redness around the wound continues to spread past the current boundaries, I would recommend being seen by a physician in person. At this time, continue with the oral antibiotics and soak the area and warm soapy water.
responses.content_zh: 这似乎是肉芽组织，现在似乎正在结痂。如果伤口周围的红肿继续蔓延到目前的范围之外，我建议你亲自去看医生。你现在可以继续服用口服抗生素并用温肥皂水浸泡该部位。

query_title_en: As shown in the image, is the wound result of a dog bite?
query_title_zh: 如图伤口是被狗咬到了吗？

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say if this is from a bite as it depends on how you sustained the injury.
responses.content_zh: 是否由咬伤引起很难判断，这取决于您受伤的方式。

responses.content_en: Possibly from dog bite given appearance of puncture wounds.  If vaccination status of dog is unknown, would recommend rabies series.  Local wound care is sufficient.
responses.content_zh: 根据伤口外观，可能是狗咬造成的穿透伤。如果狗的疫苗接种状态未知，建议接种狂犬病疫苗。局部伤口护理就行了。

responses.content_en: Based on the given image, it is difficult to say, whether this was caused by a dog bite. The supposed to be a mildly penetrating wound, keep the area clean and dry as it heals.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像，很难确定这是否是由狗咬伤引起的。应该是轻度穿透性伤口，在愈合过程中保持该部位清洁干燥。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, I hurt my knee while running a little over two months ago, and the scab eventually fell off. But now it looks like this, with a layer of skin and flesh underneath.
query_title_zh: 如图，我这膝盖差不多两个多月前跑步时磕坏了，然后也定嘎吱掉了。可是随后就成这样了，一层皮底下有肉?
query_content_en: What’s going on? It's been like this for more than half a month.
query_content_zh: 怎么回事儿，差不多半个多月了就这样。

responses.content_en: The wound is healed but the scar is raised, leading to a keloid. I would recommend that you see a Dermatology or Plastic Surgery specialist to discuss possible treatment.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经愈合，但疤痕隆起，形成了瘢痕疙瘩。我建议您去看皮肤科或整形外科专家，讨论可能的治疗方案。

responses.content_en: This is a healing scar with some mild tissue hypertrophy.  This will likely be chronic or very slow healing given its location.  Would need scar revision for cosmetic reasons only.
responses.content_zh: 这是一个愈合的瘢痕，伴随有轻微的组织增生。由于位置原因，这可能变成慢性伤口或非常缓慢愈合。如果有美容需要，那便需要疤痕修复手术。

responses.content_en: This wound appears to be healing well, Given the location and constant movement to the area of this area may take some additional time to heal. There may be some scarring to the area. ￼
responses.content_zh: 这个伤口似乎愈合得很好。考虑到伤口的位置、和在有关部位不能固定，伤口可能需要一些额外的时间才能愈合。该处可能有一些疤痕形成。

query_title_en: I was bitten by a dog as shown in the image. Besides the vaccine, do I need to get the human rabies immune globulin shot?
query_title_zh: 被狗咬了伤口如图，请问除了打疫苗针，还有必要打蛋白针吗

responses.content_en: No rabies vaccine is needed at this time unless the dog has rabies. I would recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care as you may need a tetanus vaccine if it has been over 5 years as well as possible antibiotics given the bite.
responses.content_zh: 目前不需要注射狂犬疫苗，除非该狗有狂犬病。我建议您前往最近的急诊中心，因为如果您的破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，您可能需要接种破伤风疫苗，并可能需要抗生素治疗咬伤。

responses.content_en: If dog bite and unknown vaccination status would recommend rabies series.  Keeping the wound clean with warm soapy soaks and a clean dressing is sufficient for wound care
responses.content_zh: 如果是狗咬伤且疫苗接种状态未知，建议接种狂犬病疫苗。保持伤口清洁，伤口护理方面用温肥皂水浸泡和干净的敷料保持清洁就足够了

responses.content_en: Depending on where you live and on whether the dog has been vaccinated for rabies, you may need the  rabies immunoglobulin shot. You may also need antibiotics to prevent infection.  Make sure to keep the area clean and dry.
responses.content_zh: 根据你住的地方和狗是否接种了狂犬症疫苗，你可能需要接种狂犬症免疫球蛋白。你可能还需要抗生素来预防感染。确保该部位保持清洁干燥。

query_title_en: How to handle self-harm wounds?
query_title_zh: 自残的伤口要怎么处理？
query_content_en: If my parents find out, things will get worse. I don't have anyone reliable nearby, so I had to seek help online. It's not a threat... Last night, I cut myself with a utility knife. I cleaned it with alcohol and applied several band-aids. Before sleeping, I noticed blood seeping out, so I replaced the band-aids. Due to insufficient preparation during the band-aid change, it bled for quite a while. Today, I woke up and it looks like the picture. My left hand feels slightly uncomfortable. I want to know if I need stitches. Can I stitch it myself, or should I go to which department in the hospital? Female, 15 years old.
query_content_zh: 如果被爸妈知道事情会更严重，身边也没有可靠的人，只好网上求助了，并不是恐吓……昨天晚上用美工刀割了一个口子，用乙醇消毒液涂了一下就贴了几张创口贴，睡前看到血渗出来了重新贴了几张新的创口贴，换创口贴的过程因为准备不够充足流血流了好一会儿，今天醒来大概是如图的样子，左手也稍稍有点不太舒服，想知道需不需要缝针，可以自己缝吗，或者去医院该去哪门门诊？女，15岁。

responses.content_en: I would not recommend that you stitch this yourself. If it is still bleeding or you have numbness and tingling in your arm or hand, I would recommend that you go to the hospital for further evaluatoin and to obtain stitches. If the bleeding has stopped, perform local wound care with washing the area with soap and water, apply antibiotic ointment and cover with bandages.
responses.content_zh: 我不建议您自行缝合。如果仍然在出血或您的手臂或手有麻木和刺痛感，我建议您去医院进行进一步检查并进行缝合。如果出血已经停止，进行局部伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗该区域，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Unable to see extent of wound.  Given bleeding would likely need stiches but need to see how much tissue damage is present.  Needs to be gently  cleaned with warm soapy water with clean dressing.
responses.content_zh: 无法看出伤口的程度。考虑到出血，可能需要缝合，但需要查看损伤的组织程度。需要用温肥皂水轻柔清洁，使用干净的敷料。

responses.content_en: It is hard to say how deep the incision is based on the given image, I would recommend being seen by a physician for further evaluation and washout to determine whether you need proper dressings or sutures.  I would also recommend seeking any mental health resources you have given the concern for self-harm, which can be provided at the hospital.
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难确定伤口有多深。我建议你去看医生做进一步评估和冲洗，以确定你是否只需要把伤口包扎好、或需要缝针愈合。由於你有自残的忧虑，我还建议你去寻求有关心理健康的资源，这些资源在医院可以提供。

query_title_en: For wounds like this, will it be infected with tetanus
query_title_zh: 问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？如图！
query_content_en: Patient information: Male 20 years old. Illness description (onset of illness, main symptoms): Will wound like this get infected with tetanus? It was lacerated by an iron board. A layer of skin was removed, and bleeding. The diameter is 5mm. Treated with hydrogen peroxide for three times. It has passed 24 hours. What kind of help wanted: Will wound like this get infected with tetanus? How should I treat it? Past treatment and if there is past allergery or hereditery illness: None.
query_content_zh: 患者信息：男 20岁 病情描述(发病时间、主要症状等)：问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？被铁皮划破，掉了一层皮，出血，直径5mm，用双氧水处理了3次，已过24小时。想得到怎样的帮助：问这样伤口会感染破伤风吗？如何处理？曾经治疗情况及是否有过敏、遗传病史：无

responses.content_en: I recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care for further evaluation as you may need a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since your last one as well as to evaluate if there is an infection given the redness and swelling surrounding the wound.
responses.content_zh: 我建议您前往最近的急诊中心进行进一步评估，因为如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，可能需要接种破伤风疫苗，如果伤口周围红肿, 需检查是否有感染迹象。

responses.content_en: Appears to be healing with granulation.  Does not have significant signs of secondary infection.  Avoid using any drying agents such as hydrogen peroxide, alcohol, or iodine as this will delay healing.  Instead, use emollients or topical antibiotic ointment and nonadherent dressing.  If tetanus is not up-to-date, tetanus should be updated.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎正在愈合，并有肉芽组织。目前没有明显的二次感染迹象。避免使用任何干燥剂，如过氧化氢、酒精或碘，这会延迟愈合。相反，可以使用润肤剂或局部抗生素软膏和不粘贴敷料。如果破伤风疫苗接种过期，则应更新。

responses.content_en: If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting the tetanus vaccine. I would avoid using hydrogen peroxide as that further prevent healing and damage the skin. I would recommend washing the area with warm soapy water and applying a dressing to the area.
responses.content_zh: 如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。 我会避免使用二氧化氢，因为这会进一步阻碍愈合和损害皮肤。我建议用温肥皂水清洗该部位，并在该处涂抹包扎物料。

query_title_en: My nail was pricked by a saw blade. After bandaging it, a week later I noticed the wound is still open.
query_title_zh: 手指尖指甲边让锯齿扎伤了，包扎完，过了一个星期了，发现伤口是分开的
query_content_en: As shown in the picture, will it heal properly? It won't keep splitting like this, right? At the time, the wound didn't seem big, so it wasn't stitched. It was caused by a saw blade prick. I've had a tetanus shot.
query_content_zh: 如图所示 可以长好么 不会这样一直裂着吧 当时看伤口不大也没有缝 是让锯齿的倒刺扎进去扎伤的 打过破伤风

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibitoic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage. It may take 2-4 weeks to heal.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并涂抹抗生素软膏。用干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。伤口可能需要2-4周才能愈合。

responses.content_en: Do soapy soaks and warm soapy water 3 times a day.  Apply topical antibiotic ointment and use nonadherent dressing.  Monitor for any signs of infection such as swelling, redness, or significant purulent drainage.
responses.content_zh: 每天用温肥皂水浸泡3次。涂抹局部抗生素软膏并使用不粘贴敷料。留意是否有感染迹象，如肿胀、红肿或明显的脓性分泌物。

responses.content_en: This wound will heal properly if you keep the area clean and protect it appropriately. I would wash the finger with warm soapy soaks and wrap the finger with a dressing to prevent any further opening of the wound. ￼
responses.content_zh: 如果你保持伤口部位清洁、并有适当保护，这个伤口会正常愈合。我会用温热的肥皂水浸泡手指，并用包扎物包裹手指，以防止伤口进一步裂开。

query_title_en: As shown in the image, what is happening to my feet? It hurts so bad, what should I do? Anything that can cure this?
query_title_zh: 如图，我的脚是怎么回事？？太痛苦了，该怎么？用什么可以治好？
query_content_en: The texture often crack open
query_content_zh: 那些纹路经常会裂开，，

responses.content_en: The dryness of skin is leading to the skin opening up and causing pain. I would recommend that you consult a doctor as you would need a strong steroid cream to help this heal. In the meantime, try to apply moisturizing cream as often as possible.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤干燥导致了开裂和出血。您可以涂抹类固醇软膏，然后涂上一层厚厚的保湿霜。伤口愈合后，应继续每天使用保湿霜。您可以服用止痛药来缓解疼痛。

responses.content_en: Given scaling, likely fungal infection.  Can try antifungal medication but likely needs long term wound care to properly heal.
responses.content_zh: 因为有到鳞屑，可能是真菌感染。可以尝试抗真菌药物，但可能需要长期的伤口护理以正确愈合。

responses.content_en: This is likely a superficial wound to the foot, either from friction for from a fungal infection.  Would recommend keeping the area clean and dry to prevent infection,  it will take some time to heal. you can also try topical antifungal treatment.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是脚部的浅表伤口，可能是摩擦造成的、或是真菌感染造成的。建议保持该部位清洁干燥，以防止感染，这伤口需要一些时间才能愈合。你也可以尝试涂用抗真菌药膏治疗。

query_title_en: Has this wound (as shown in the picture) healed? Why or why not?
query_title_zh: 这伤口（如图）痊愈了没？为什么？

responses.content_en: There may be  foreign material in the center of the wound delaying wound healing.
responses.content_zh: 伤口中央可能有异物，导致伤口愈合延迟。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be ulceration versus vesicular nature on palmar surface.  If it is vesicular possibly dyshidrotic eczema versus herpes simplex virus.  Would recommend follow-up with primary care doctor for viral testing.  Otherwise local wound care with moisturizing agents and topical antibiotics with nonadherent dressing.  If there are other lesions to palms/soles, would recommend further evaluation by primary care doctor for other infectious etiology.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎是腱疽性溃疡或水泡状。若为水泡，可能是湿疹或单纯疱疹病毒。建议与初级保健医生跟进进行病毒检测。否则继续局部伤口护理，使用保湿剂和局部抗生素，并使用不粘贴敷料。如果手掌/脚底有其他损伤，建议由初级保健医生进一步评估其他感染病因。

responses.content_en: The wound is currently healing, there is some mild redness to the area that may take some more time to heal. I would recommend keeping the area clean and dry while continues to heal.
responses.content_zh: 伤口目前正在愈合。在那里有一些轻微的发红，可能需要更多时间才能愈好。在愈合的期间，我建议你保持伤口部位清洁干燥。

query_content_en: Urgent! I'm in the 9th grade and really busy with schoolwork! Two weeks ago, I discovered my toenail had pierced into the flesh, so I cut it. I didn't expect it to leave a wound. Now it's pus-filled, and after searching online, I think it's paronychia. I don't know what to do. Can any experts please give me advice? My situation is in the picture. I'd prefer to handle it myself. I think doing surgery wouldn't be too painful for me, but I'm worried it might take too much time, especially since it's 9th grade. Right now, I'm leaning towards incision and drainage, but I'm not sure of the details. Thank you!
query_content_zh: 急！！本人初三学业很紧！两周前发现脚指甲扎到肉里去了就把它剪了，没想到伤口已经留下来了。现在化了脓百度了一下知道是甲沟炎，不知道该怎么办，请各位大神支个招。情况如图。最好自己解决，手术的话痛没什么，就怕耽误太多时间毕竟是初三。目前比较倾向切开引流，不知道详细情况。谢谢！(ಥ_ಥ)

responses.content_en: If there is pus, it does need an incision and drainage but I would recommend having a doctor perform this as you may also need antibiotics for the infection.
responses.content_zh: 如果有脓液，确实需要进行切开引流，但我建议由医生进行此操作，因为您可能还需要抗生素来治疗感染。

responses.content_en: If fluid is present, will likely need incision and drainage. Can try warm soapy soaks which might soften the nail and allow for spontaneous drainage
responses.content_zh: 如果有液体存在，可能需要切开和引流。可以尝试温肥皂水浸泡，这可能会软化指甲并允许自发排出。

responses.content_en: You are correct, this is likely paronychia. You likely would not require surgery however I would recommend being seen by a physician for an incision and drainage performed by them,  as they can perform this procedure sterilely and help with pain control. You can also try warm compresses to help with the drainage.
responses.content_zh: 你是对的，这可能是甲沟炎。你可能不需要手术，但我建议由医生进行伤口切口和引流，因为他们可以无菌地进行手术和帮助控制疼痛。你也可以尝试热敷来帮助引流。

query_title_en: As shown in the picture, it's urgent. How should I treat this type of wound?
query_title_zh: 如图，急，这种伤口如何处理。
query_content_en: I cut myself with a kitchen knife while cutting meat. It hurts a little.
query_content_zh: 切肉的时候被菜刀切爆了，有一点点疼。

responses.content_en: Clean wound with soap and water daily and apply antibiotic ointment. Cover with a dry bandage.
responses.content_zh: 每天用肥皂和水清洗伤口，并涂抹抗生素软膏。用干燥的绷带覆盖伤口。

responses.content_en: Given the bleeding, there is likely some injury to the nailbed underneath the fingernail.  There does not appear to be any subungual hematoma that would require trephination.  Local wound care including warm soapy soaks in warm soapy water 1-3 times a day is likely appropriate.  If significant bruising under the fingernail develops, may require trephination.
responses.content_zh: 鉴于出血，可能指甲床下有一些伤害。似乎没有需要穿刺的指甲血肿。局部伤口护理包括每周1到3次用温肥皂水浸泡是合适的。如果指甲下出现明显淤血，可能需要穿刺。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided as to whether the knife has cut through the underlying skin under the nail. I would recommend being seen by a physician in person to determine the depth of this injury if bruising under the nail develops. I would recommend soaking your finger in soapy water a few times a day while it continues to heal.
responses.content_zh: 根据所提供的图像，很难说这刀伤是否已穿过了指甲下的下层皮肤。如果指甲下出现瘀伤，我建议你亲自去看医生，以确定损伤的深度。在伤口愈合期間，我建议每天用肥皂水浸泡几次。

query_content_en: A year ago, my classmate used a pencil sharpener's knife, and cut at my joint area of the left ring finger. Now the wound is healed, but you can still see there is some black area inside the tissue (as shown in the image). Will it be alright? What should I do?
query_content_zh: 一年前同学用削铅笔的刀割了我的左手无名指的关节处，现在伤口愈合了，可是还是可以亲眼看见肉里有一道黑色的东西（如图）。这会不会有事啊？我还怎么办？

responses.content_en: This may be hyperpigmentation of the scar. There is nothing to do at this time.
responses.content_zh: 这可能是疤痕的色素沉着。目前无需处理。

responses.content_en: Pigmentation underneath the skin is likely subdermal and related to some scarring or possible reaction to foreign body from the initial wound.  As long as it is not painful and range of motion is preserved, this is likely only cosmetic.
responses.content_zh: 皮肤下的色素可能是真皮下的，与一些瘢痕或对最初伤口异物的反应有关。只要不疼痛且活动范围保持正常，这很可能就只是一个美观问题。

responses.content_en: It is difficult to say based on the image provided, I would recommend being a valuated by a physician in person to determine whether there is an underlying foreign body with your finger. It does not appear to be infected at this time, as long as you are able to, range your finger without difficulty, this appears to have healed well. ￼
responses.content_zh: 根据提供的图像很难确定情况。我建议由医生来做评估，以确定你的手指是否有外物侵进。现在如果你能毫无困难地活动你的手指，它似乎没有受到感染。它似乎已经愈合得很好了。

query_title_en: I was scratched by a cat through thick jeans, leaving a blood mark as shown in the picture. Do I need to get a rabies vaccine?
query_title_zh: 被猫隔着厚牛仔裤抓了一下，留下一道血痕，伤口如图，请问需要接种狂犬疫苗吗

responses.content_en: No need for rabies vaccine in this situation.
responses.content_zh: 在这种情况下不需要注射狂犬疫苗。

responses.content_en: If vaccination status of cat unknown and cannot be quarantined, while risk is low, depending on the area, would recommend vaccination.  Otherwise, local wound care with topical antibiotic and dressing is sufficient
responses.content_zh: 如果猫的疫苗接种状态未知且无法隔离，虽然风险较低，具体取决于地区，建议接种疫苗。否则，局部伤口护理，使用局部抗生素和敷料是就行了。

responses.content_en: You should not need to get a rabies vaccine for a cat scratch as the risk of transmission of rabies from a scratch is very low however, if you live in an area with high instance, I would consider it. However, I would continue to keep an eye on the area as you may need antibiotics for the cat scratch if it becomes infected. I would dress the wound with antibiotic ointment. ￼
responses.content_zh: 你应该不需要为猫抓伤接种狂犬症疫苗，因为从抓伤传播狂犬症的风险非常低。当然，如果你居住在一个狂犬症发病率很高的也区，我会另作考虑。虽然如此，我会继续观察伤口部位；如果伤口己受感染，你可能需要抗生素来治疗。我会用抗生素软膏包扎伤口。

query_title_en: Do I need to get vaccinated immediately for a minor cat scratch?
query_title_zh: 被猫轻微抓伤需要立即接种疫苗吗
query_content_en: I live in a rural area and have a good relationship with the neighbor's cat. It usually comes over when I call. I was likely scratched while playing with it, and the scratch doesn't seem intentional. The wound is very small, as shown in the picture; the red spot on my middle finger is the healed scar. Do I need to get vaccinated immediately, or can I wait and observe for ten days? The scratch bled a little, and the wound is barely visible in the picture. I was scratched three hours ago this evening.
query_content_zh: 家住农村，邻居家的家猫，和我关系不错，一叫就过来，应该是逗着玩的时候被抓伤（不像是故意），很小的伤口，如图，中指中间那一小块的红就是伤口愈合的痕迹，需要立即接种吗，还是不打观察十日？是流了一点点血的，伤口如图，可能看不出来，今晚三个小时前被抓的

responses.content_en: I recommend that you go to the nearest Urgent Care to receive a tetanus vaccine if it has been 5 years since your last one. Continue woud care with washing with soap and water, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 如果您上次接种破伤风疫苗已经超过5年，我建议您前往最近的急诊中心接种破伤风疫苗。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: Does not appear to be secondarily infected.  If cat is known to the you and can be observed for any behavioral changes or vaccination status is known, unlikely to need rabies series.  If vaccination status is unknown or cannot be observed, would recommend discussion with medical provider as to utility of rabies series.  Tetanus should be updated if tetanus is not up-to-date.  Poor picture quality making interpretation difficult.
responses.content_zh: 似乎没有二次感染。如果猫是你认识的并且可以观察行为变化，或确认疫苗接种状态，则不太可能需要狂犬病疫苗。如果疫苗接种状态未知或无法观察，建议与医生讨论狂犬病疫苗系列的必要性。如果破伤风接种过期，应该更新。图像质量较差，导致解释困难

responses.content_en: You should be able to wait and observe for a few days, if the cat is familiar and has not shown any signs of rabies and you know that the cat has been vaccinated with the rabies vaccine. If you were tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend receiving the tetanus vaccine. Otherwise, this wound should heal well on its own.
responses.content_zh: 如果你可以联系到这只猫、它没有任何狂犬症的迹象、和它已经接种了狂犬症疫苗，你应该可以观察多几天。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。否则，这个伤口应该会自行愈合。

query_content_en: Do I need a rabies shot? I've had a kitten for over three months, and today while I was surfing the internet, it suddenly jumped over and scratched me with its teeth, as shown in the picture. I used soap to wash it, and there is a slight skin break but no bleeding. Should I get a rabies shot for this?
query_content_zh: 需要打狂犬吗？养了三个多月的小猫，今天我在上网的时候它突然跳过来，用牙齿划了一道痕，如图，我用肥皂洗了一下，有一点点破皮，没出血，请问这样需要打狂犬吗？

responses.content_en: No need for rabies shot. Continue wound care with washing with soap and water daily, applying antibiotic ointment and covering with a bandage.
responses.content_zh: 无需注射狂犬疫苗。继续进行伤口护理，每天用肥皂和水清洗，涂抹抗生素软膏，并用绷带覆盖。

responses.content_en: If the kitten is domesticated and does not go outside and can be quarantined and monitored for abnormal behavior over the next 2 weeks, unlikely to need rabies vaccination.  Monitor for signs of infection.  Update tetanus shot if not updated.  If the you own this cat, cat should have vaccinations updated or record of vaccinations.
responses.content_zh: 如果小猫是家养且不在外面活动，并且可以在接下来的两周内进行隔离和观察异常行为，那么很可能不需要接种狂犬病疫苗。观察感染迹象。如果过期则更新破伤风疫苗。如果你是猫的主人，则应更新猫的疫苗接种记录。

responses.content_en: The likelihood of transmission of rabies via a cat scratch is low as long as you know that the cat is up-to-date on its rabies vaccine and/or the cat does not show any signs of rabies. I would wash the area as you did and keep it clean and dry. If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 只要你知道猫接种了有效的狂犬症疫苗、和/或猫没有表现出任何狂犬症迹象，受到猫抓损导致狂犬症的可能性就很低。你要像以前一样清洗伤口部位，保持干净干燥。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。

query_title_en: [Urgent] How should I scientifically care for a scratch on my face so it heals quickly? (Picture attached)
query_title_zh: 【紧急】脸上被指甲划到后,该如何科学保养会很快好?(附图)
query_content_en: Yesterday at noon, while playing basketball, my face was accidentally scratched by a classmate's fingernail, causing a small wound about the size of a pinky nail (as shown in the picture). At home, I disinfected the wound with some alcohol and have not let it touch water since then to prevent infection. Now the wound has scabbed over (as shown in the picture). I want to ask how to care for it scientifically so that it heals quickly and the scar fades as much as possible. What should I do daily, and what is the timeline? Could you please outline the steps for me to follow? Also, can the scabbed area touch water now (like when washing my face)? Thanks in advance for your help. Additionally, how can I deal with acne marks? I have some noticeable acne marks on both sides of my face. What are the best ways to remove them? If there are effective medications, please recommend them. However, I hope they will fade on their own quickly. Thank you all!
query_content_zh: 昨天中午打球的时候,脸部不小心被同学的指甲给刮到,流了一点血,伤口大概小拇指指甲那么大...(如图)  中午回家后,我找了点酒把伤口消了毒,然后持续到现在,我伤口那个部位还没有碰过水,我是怕伤口感染...现在伤口起疤了!(如图)  我想问各位,如何科学护理好才能使其快速的恢复?且伤疤尽可能地淡化,平时需要做哪些工作?大概需要哪些时间,方便的话,可以说说步骤...我参考下...伤口现在起了点疤,可以碰水了吧?(比如伤口部分洗脸时,碰到等)好了,在此感谢大家了...顺便问题下...痘印怎么处理...我脸部两边都有一些痘印,比较明显..所以想问一下,如何去除...如果有好的药物的话,不妨推荐下...但我还是希望它自己很快能够淡化...谢谢大家~

responses.content_en: The wound is healed and you can wash your face with water. You can apply antibiotic ointment and cover with a bandage daily. Avoid direct sunlight when outdoors by wearing a hat and sunscreen.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经愈合，您可以用水洗脸。可以每天涂抹抗生素软膏并用绷带覆盖。外出时避免阳光直射，戴帽子并使用防晒霜。

responses.content_en: Regarding the scab, clean the area gently with warm soapy water three times a day.  Avoid UV exposure to prevent scar formation.  Avoid drying agents like alcohol and hydrogen peroxide.  May apply topical antibiotic ointment as needed while healing.  Do not pick at scab as this will cause scarring,
responses.content_zh: 关于结痂，轻柔地用热肥皂水每天清洁三次。避免紫外线暴露以防止瘢痕形成。避免使用如酒精和过氧化氢等干燥剂。愈合期间可以根据需要涂抹局部抗生素软膏。不要挑结痂，这会造成瘢痕。

responses.content_en: In order to promote healing and prevent scarring, I would avoid vigorously washing or scraping at the wound. I would recommend avoiding sun exposure when possible, wearing sunscreen to prevent further scarring. The scabbed area can't touch water now, but again do not vigorously wipe the area. With regards to the acne marks, once the wound is healed, I would recommend using topical treatments like benzoyl peroxide or topical retinoids to help prevent further acne and reduce scarring.
responses.content_zh: 为了助长愈合和防止疤痕，我会避免用力清洗或刮擦伤口。我建议尽可能避免阳光照射，涂用防晒霜以防止疤痕进一步增长。结痂部份现在不能接触水，亦不要用力擦拭该处。关于痤疮斑点；一旦伤口愈合，我建议使用过氧化苯甲酰或维甲酸等外用治疗方法，以帮助预防痤疮生长和减少结疤。

query_content_en: What should I do with the wound in its current state? After it got infected and suppurated before, the doctor treated it and applied Mupirocin ointment (a topical antibiotic), making it a bright pink color. After I treated it at home, it looks as shown in the picture. How should I handle the wound now?
query_content_zh: 伤口现在这种情况应该怎么办?之前感染化脓后，医生处理后，用莫匹罗星软膏（局部外用抗生素）涂抹，呈鲜粉红色。后来自己在家处理后，呈现如图所示，现在应如何处理伤口总会呢?

responses.content_en: The wound has healed and infection is resolved. The skin will return to its original color in 1-1.5 years as the scar softens.
responses.content_zh: 伤口已经愈合，感染已消退。随着疤痕逐渐软化，皮肤将在1-1.5年内恢复到原来的颜色。

responses.content_en: Wound appears to be healing well with granulation tissue and some mild scarring developing.  Does not appear to have any open skin and can likely stop antibiotic ointment.  For scar care, avoid UV exposure, use scar cream such as Mederma.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎愈合良好，具有肉芽组织，并开始出现一些轻微的瘢痕。皮肤似乎没有口子，可以停止使用抗生素软膏。对于瘢痕护理，避免暴露于紫外线，使用去疤痕膏如Mederma。

responses.content_en: The wound appears to be healing appropriately, I would continue applying mupirocin to the area. I would avoid sunlight to prevent further scarring.
responses.content_zh: 伤口似乎在正常愈合中，我会继续在该部位应用莫匹罗星药膏。我会避免阳光照射，以防止疤痕进一步的生长。

query_content_en: Can I take a bath if my foot is burned? (as shown in the picture, it's been two days)
query_content_zh: 脚被烫伤可以洗澡吗？如图两天了

responses.content_en: It is OK to clean the wound with soap and water during a bath.
responses.content_zh: 在洗澡时可以用肥皂和水清洗伤口。

responses.content_en: Burn appears to be partial superficial thickness with some blistering.  Would recommend gentle wound care including gentle washing with warm soapy water 3 times daily and applying topical antibiotic with nonadherent dressing, changing the dressing daily.  Avoid submerging the area for extended period of times.  Avoid any drying agents such as alcohol, iodine, or hydrogen peroxide.  Update tetanus if not up-to-date.
responses.content_zh: 烧伤似乎是在部分浅层厚度，并伴有一些水泡。建议温和的伤口护理，包括每天3次用温肥皂水轻柔清洗，并涂抹局部抗生素和不粘贴敷料，每天更换敷料。避免长时间浸泡该区域。避免使用任何干燥剂，如酒精、碘或过氧化氢。如果破伤风接种过期，则应更新。

responses.content_en: You can take a bath, however I would recommend avoiding scraping or vigorously cleaning the area. Once you were done taking a shower, I would recommend soaking the area in warm soapy water and dressing the area with xero form and bacitracin ointment. If your tetanus is not up-to-date, I would recommend getting a tetanus vaccine.
responses.content_zh: 你可以洗澡，但我建议你避免刮擦或用力清洗伤口部位。洗完澡后，我建议你把该部位浸泡在温肥皂水中，并用XEROFORM和杆菌肽软膏涂敷在伤口处。如果你的破伤风疫苗注射已逾期，我建议你重新接种破伤风疫苗。
